title: Transformers One
plot: The untold origin story of Optimus Prime and Megatron, better known as sworn enemies, but who once were friends bonded like brothers who changed the fate of Cybertron forever.

subtitles.author: ALL SUB
lines:
119734 121470 Okay, let's see
what we got here.
145593 149168 there was our gracious and powerful creator,
151863 156065 To protect our universe, he sacrificed his life force,
174358 178230 appointed to lead and protect future generations.
178230 182960 To assist them, Primus created an entity of great power,

185160 188163 The Matrix, there it is. Okay.
Good. Come on. Keep going.
188163 190836 With the Matrix in the Primes' possession,
190836 197348 Cybertron's natural power source, Energon, flowed in abundance,
203048 207358 Attention! Unauthorized movement detected in archival vault.
212561 217401 For generations, there was peace and prosperity,
217401 220833 until the Matrix of Leadership was lost,

224540 228709 Why does every legend
about the Matrix
end right there?

228709 230975 One of these
has to say what happened.
233241 235386 Oh, hey there. Halt, criminal! Prepare to--

242085 244659 Well, hello, guys.
I'm so glad you're here.
246056 247596 I must've taken a wrong turn.

247596 250434 It's that defective mining bot,
Oreon Pix!

251897 253932 We told you
to never come back here!

253932 256902 Why are we all yelling?
I'm gonna smash you!

256902 259575 Hold on.
Whoa, whoa, hold on.
No need for violence.

259575 263205 How about this:
I run away, you chase me.
We play that game. Huh?

263205 265240 Come on.
You're bigger, faster.
It'll be fun.

265240 268078 He doesn't have a cog.
Let's give him a head start.

268078 270949 Why not?
It's not like
he can transform.

283599 285293 Something that flies.
Something that flies.

360975 363041 Okay, fellas!
Thanks for the head start.

363041 364482 You want to give me
another one?

364482 366880 You're dead!
I'll take that as a no.

368717 370554 Oh...
What did you say, no-cog?

370554 372116 Sorry, sir,
I didn't mean you.

372116 373986 I was referring
to the bot
who was behind you.

375493 376956 The filthy
red and blue bot?

376956 378925 Has a big mouth,
squeaky joints,

378925 380630 gives off a corroded
metallic stench?

380630 382324 Where is he?
He went that way.

382324 384502 When I get
my hands on that bot...

395238 397878 Okay, D-16,
I may be a little rusty,

399550 401684 Let me guess.
Chased out of
the archives?

401684 403752 Yeah.
I had to jump
out of a window this time.

405556 407789 And digging through
ancient data
is worth dying for?
409153 410627 I need a new best friend.

410627 412530 If there are clues
in our recorded history

412530 414631 that can help locate
the Matrix of Leadership,

419394 421506 is up on the surface
right now,

421506 424740 risking his life for us
in search of the Matrix.

424740 427842 That's exactly what I'm doing.
I'm trying to help him.

431175 433342 the sooner we won't
have to mine for it.

433342 435685 Don't you want
to choose your own path,
do whatever you want?

435685 438347 We're miners.
We mine, that's all.

438347 442857 No, there has got to be
something more I can do.
I can feel it.

442857 444892 Oh, yeah? Like the time
you had a "feeling"

444892 446663 you could transform
without a cog?

446663 448456 You said you were never
gonna mention that again.

448456 450898 Took me three days
to pry you open.

450898 452031 Your feelings
get you in trouble.

453571 455804 Just trust
in Sentinel Prime.
I do trust in him.
457577 459467 Hey, if we did have cogs--

459467 461744 I'd transform
into a shovel
and beat you.

461744 463680 I don't like how fast
you answered that.

463680 466584 But listen, if you did beat me,
I couldn't give you this awesome

466584 468850 Megatronus Prime thing
I have here. It's cool.

468850 471820 I'll give it
to someone else.
What Megatronus Prime thing?

471820 473690 Ah, it's nothing.
Just a, you know,

473690 476990 mint-condition Megatronus Prime
decal, first edition.

478596 480455 If you don't want it,
I can just throw it away.

480455 482061 Throw it away? Don't--
That's not funny.
Let me see.

482061 484459 Wait. Don't grab.
You're gonna crease it.

486639 489101 You know, Sentinel says
Megatronus was the--

489101 491004 The strongest Prime
to ever live.

492500 496680 Looks good on you.
Ah, it's really cool.
506549 509121 Approaching sublevel station. Stand clear of doors.

530947 533541 Metal to the pedal, drill bits.
This is it.

533541 536016 How much Energon have you mined
under my leadership?

537347 539349 And how perfect
is my mining record?

540856 543221 We are a mere
30 units of Energon away

550998 553704 you are looking especially shiny
this morning. New polish?

553704 555706 Orion Pax,
I'm sorry that I somehow

555706 557499 gave you the impression
that we're friends.

558973 560711 Light up that wall!
Let's go! Ten seconds!

560711 562339 Happy to take
the lead today, Captain.

562339 563978 Feeling like I have
enough power in me

563978 565881 to drill down
and touch Primus myself.

565881 567542 You don't have
the touch or the power.

567542 569753 Ready positions,
rust buckets! Let's go!

569753 571689 She's in a good mood today.
Mm-hmm.

575055 576760 Here we go.
This one won't be open long.

608187 610453 It's unstable!
We got to go, we got to move!
624775 627778 I repeat, the tunnel is closing!

627778 630946 You with me, D?
On your six! Keep going!

638283 639449 Elita, we've got
a trapped miner.

645224 647589 It's closing!
Just grab your pack and go.
648832 651164 What? No, I didn't mean it!

661603 664309 Nothing much. Just normal
protocol-following stuff.

669248 671822 Orion Pax, could you please exit
the tunnel of death?
671822 673923 Elita, it's about to get messy out there!

685869 687695 Hurry!
We're not gonna make it!

696574 698673 What the hell, Pax?
I told you to evacuate.

698673 701247 I did, eventually.
If I get fired because of you--

701247 703216 Oh, please.
They're not
gonna fire you.

705647 708716 What? Why? I followed
protocol to the letter.

708716 710652 That is true.
I was the one
who broke the rules.

712324 714623 Darkwing, please,
I've worked too hard
for this.

714623 717692 You are no-cog bots
with limited options.

722037 724039 Elita...
Next time,
why don't you stop and think

730111 733345 I may not have a cog,
but my finger can transform.

733345 736282 Guess which one?
I'll give you
a "limited option."

741826 744257 I apologize
on his behalf for the--

764211 765883 You know you were
out of line,

765883 768116 talking back
to a superior like that.

768116 770283 Darkwing was out of line.
He deserves it.

772087 774584 Aren't you tired of being
treated like we're nothing?

775653 779028 He had every right
to hit me.
I interfered.

780999 783758 Hey, and I appreciate
you having my back.

785102 786871 I'm glad
you were there with me

786871 788466 to get punched in the face.
That was fun.
792602 795737 Stand by for a live transmission from Sentinel Prime.

795737 798641 He's back?
He's back already?
Maybe he found the Matrix.
808618 811258 Hello to our saviors, the industrious miners
811258 814261 who toil selflessly to maintain our Energon reserves.
822533 825305 Once again, I have narrowly returned with my fleet
826977 830343 across the desolate, dangerous surface of our planet.
830343 832884 I departed with hopes of finding the Matrix of Leadership,
832884 835084 the key to bringing balance to Cybertron.
839781 843158 This is a setback, but not a failure.
843158 846194 Rest assured, I will find the Matrix of Leadership,
850462 853762 Right now, I think we all deserve a little fun!
853762 856303 Tomorrow, there will be no work. All shifts off
864839 867875 A high-octane race all across Iacon City.
867875 872154 Let's all see which competitor can prove they are truly more than meets the eye.

893142 895441 Oh, good, you're up.
Come on, I have an idea.

895441 898378 Whatever this is,
it better be good.

898378 900083 Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
Okay. Listen.

900083 902184 All right, what if...
what if...

904681 908520 we ran
in the Iacon 5000, huh?

909556 911490 What if kill you
for waking me up?
911490 913228 No, no, no, hear me out.
913228 914691 We don't even have to win!

914691 916066 Oh, that's good,
because we wouldn't.

916066 919267 But-- But if we beat
just one Transformer,

919267 921269 it proves
we're just as good as they are.

921269 923403 Not only would we
go down in history,

923403 926736 the mining bots
that did the impossible,

926736 928606 but we would show everyone
that we're--

928606 930674 we're capable
of so much more!

932016 933743 and then busted
back to tier one.

933743 936680 Yeah, but at least we would've
done something, you know?

939782 942653 We're mining bots
who can't transform.

942653 945887 We can't fly,
we can't roll,

963674 965247 I have a surprise
for you. Come on.

965247 967447 Where are you going?
The stadium's that way.

967447 969119 Yeah, yeah, I know.
Follow me.

969119 971220 Great.
We're gonna be late now.

973354 976225 We came all this way to miss
the opening ceremony.
This is wonderful!

976225 977996 Trust me,
I know what I'm doing.

983331 986763 Get caught in one of those,
it'll launch you
halfway across the city.

986763 988369 Okay,
where are you taking me?

990239 992769 Don't be a glitch, this will be
totally worth it. Trust me.
992769 994111 Hey, you don't be a glitch.

994111 995805 Look, I know this is, like,
fun for you,

997378 999974 but if you make me miss
any part of the Iacon 5000,

999974 1003549 I swear I will smelt
your face right off your...
1006257 1010325 Welcome to the Iacon 5000. There they are.
1010325 1015627 Put your hands together as today's competitors are taking the field.

1018597 1022271 This is unbelievable!
I feel like I'm in the race!
1034615 1037682 And now the moment you've all been waiting for.
1042555 1046163 Quintessons fear him, but we love him!

1055031 1059143 Yes! It feels so good
to be here with you all today.

1069043 1071584 since the Quintessons
attacked our home.

1071584 1075126 Fifty cycles since we lost
the Matrix of Leadership

1075126 1077755 and our Energon supply
dried up.

1077755 1081825 Fifty cycles since the battle
that killed the other Primes,

1081825 1083794 my brothers
and sisters in arms.

1083794 1088029 Today we honor the Primes
who gave their lives for ours

1088029 1091736 and we show them
that the strength of Cybertron
will never be diminished.

1103387 1106223 I can't believe we get to watch
from the starting line.

1106223 1108753 The best seats
in the house!

1111591 1114396 It's time to show them
we are more than meets the eye.

1125308 1127904 Are you crazy?
Sure feels like it.

1135221 1137782 I'm sorry, are those
miners in the race?

1137782 1140224 Miners!
Those are miners,
like us!
1140224 1143117 I can't believe what I'm seeing here! Miners trying to run
1143117 1144822 in the Iacon 5000! You've got to be kidding me.

1146923 1149563 There are miners
in the race!
Miners?

1149563 1150795 No way!
They can't even transform!
1155769 1159034 This is a first in Iacon 5000 history.

1163511 1166008 If we survive this,
I'm gonna kill you!
1172885 1175853 It's Tailwind pulling into the lead down the main stretch

1184193 1186732 I owe you one.
More like a thousand.

1189198 1190934 I can't believe
we're not in last place!

1213596 1216300 Hey! Get off!
Spinout! Big fan!

1216300 1218566 Hey!
Jetstorm, I'm so sorry.
Big fan!
1242086 1245186 And the miners have fallen way behind.
1245186 1248057 We can now focus on the real contenders in this race.
1265714 1269353 I don't believe it! The miners take down Darkwing!

1275623 1277790 Is this the dumbest thing
we've ever done?
1298175 1300142 A four-bot pileup in the magnetic tunnel
1300142 1303453 and the two miners are now in first position!
1317500 1319601 One miner is now carrying the other
1321966 1325739 in the most amazing, sensational, dramatic, heartrending, exciting,
1333483 1336618 Chromia comes from behind to take the prize.
1336618 1338983 Talk about an Iacon 5000 for the ages.

1340985 1342756 Well, second place
is still pretty good.
1346762 1349763 Paging Dr. Ratchet. Dr. Ratchet to Medical Bay 94.

1349763 1351864 Do not worry.
You will be fixed up
in no time.

1360708 1362875 how long do you think
we'll be here?

1369312 1371345 You know what?
I can't believe
you made me do that.

1371345 1373820 We are so screwed!
Thought you weren't
talking to me.

1373820 1376955 Hey, look, I know
it's all a big joke to you.
But not me.

1376955 1379188 I was paying my dues.
I was going places.

1379188 1380563 And now they're gonna
bust me down

1380563 1382026 I-- I don't even know
how many tiers!

1383830 1385568 But come on,
didn't you feel it?

1385568 1387669 Even for just a second,
didn't you feel liberated?

1387669 1389297 Didn't you feel like
you were something else?

1389297 1392168 Like you could be more
than what they say you are?
1392168 1394874 Yeah, I felt it. I did.

1397547 1399912 We're going to get
punished and demoted.

1399912 1403014 Sentinel Prime
saw the whole thing.

1429513 1432109 was one of the
craziest things
I've ever seen.

1432109 1434617 Sir, this is all my idea,
and we're so sorry.

1437114 1438984 How could anyone
not love it?

1438984 1441756 You gave my best racers
a real run for their money.

1457068 1459268 The fact of the matter
is we're halfway
into the first shift

1459268 1464647 since the race ended
and that mining crew
has already reached 150% quota.

1464647 1466781 You inspired them
to work harder!

1468882 1473150 we joined the race
to show everyone our potential.

1473150 1475086 That we bots can do
more than just mine--

1475086 1478419 Outstanding! I love a bot
that can think for himself.

1478419 1480157 Perhaps you two
could tour the mines,

1480157 1482456 speak to your brethren, and
help them see their potential.

1486394 1488297 I would love to--
Sir, it's time.

1491608 1493676 We're preparing
our next travel
to the surface.

1493676 1496470 But in the meantime,
I've got a treat for you.

1496470 1499616 Hang tight.
Airachnid, have someone
escort these heroes

1514092 1516193 You still mad at me?
I am less mad at you.

1516193 1518833 I'm telling you, D--
I got a feeling
that everything's gonna change

1533045 1535542 We were supposed to go
to Sentinel Prime's service pod!

1535542 1538853 You two dolts aren't going
to see anyone ever again.

1540349 1542659 You're making a mistake!
Ask Sentinel!
1558567 1560336 You! How did you get down here?
1560336 1562074 There's no access to this level.

1562074 1564109 There is nobody
down here but me.

1569884 1572623 You're here,
and you're not me!

1576858 1579355 I am so sorry. That must
have been weird for you.

1579355 1581555 I just haven't had
a lot of company

1581555 1583667 since they put me
down here in sublevel 50.

1583667 1586934 Fifty? But there
are only 40 sublevels.

1588595 1591565 Turns out there are ten more,
and they are not pleasant.

1591565 1593336 Probably why nobody ever
really talks about them.

1593336 1594744 How long have you
been down here?
1594744 1596405 How long have I been here?

1596405 1599606 Let's see, somewhere
between a long time and forever?

1599606 1603346 I mean, I had other jobs,
but I kept getting reassigned

1603346 1605216 'cause I'm so good
at what I do.
1608252 1609726 But you can call me B.

1609726 1611387 And I'm actually
working on some nicknames.

1611387 1614093 The one I'm floating right now
is Badassatron.
1617866 1619230 But if you have any critiques--

1619230 1622233 Yeah, great.
How do we get
out of here?

1625775 1628074 We have limited access
to the waste management area,

1628074 1632144 but the new shift manager there
does not like distractions.

1632144 1635180 No, they prefer we stay here
on the task at hand.

1636753 1639690 The scrap comes in
from the chute there

1641483 1644420 Our job is to look for anything
that might be worth salvaging

1644420 1647126 before it hits the furnace
and gets smelted.

1650657 1652296 It is so great
that you're here now.

1652296 1654199 I can't wait to learn
everything about you.

1654199 1656036 And then tell you
everything about me!

1656036 1658940 I have a lot of hopes and dreams
that I am just dying to share

1658940 1660271 with one or two
new best friends.
1660271 1662471 Uh, yeah, I would love to--

1664143 1665947 Come on, I'll introduce you
to the rest of the crew.

1671755 1675517 this is A-A-Tron,
and this fella here is Steve.
1677926 1679895 Do they talk back to you?
1682194 1684834 Jeez, you think I'm that crazy?

1684834 1686297 It's just
you've been down here a--
1686297 1687870 No, I was talking to Steve.

1690499 1692303 What is that?
Look at this guy.

1697847 1701048 I am so sorry.
Steve, no!

1701048 1703149 We can fix it, don't worry.
My Steve!
1708055 1711190 Calling the High Guard for immediate support. Immediate support!
1717328 1720166 It's an SOS message. Protect the Matrix!

1729340 1732640 Those are coordinates
to a location on the surface.

1732640 1737249 This could be
where the Primes died
in the Quintesson war.

1737249 1740681 Which means
this is where we could find

1743024 1746555 What are you talking about?
It's an old beacon
inside a statue made of garbage.

1746555 1748194 Or it's a clue
of how we could find

1748194 1750966 the Matrix of Leadership.
No. No way. Absolutely not!

1750966 1753760 Hey, D, come on,
this could be our chance
to show everyone we're not--

1755201 1756730 in the race
you tricked me
into running,

1756730 1758105 which got us
stuck down here

1758105 1760536 in this waste hole
with this, uh...

1763473 1765706 Oh, thank you.
I'm just saying--

1765706 1767510 There's a reason
no one goes
to the surface.

1769248 1771613 I'm waiting right here
until Sentinel Prime
finds us.

1773483 1776552 Well, we'll just
stay here forever.
That cool with you, B?

1777960 1780193 I have new coworkers
and roommates.

1780193 1782129 There's plenty of room
now that Steve is dead.

1782129 1784263 I usually sleep
on the conveyor belt,
but you can totally have it.

1784263 1785792 I'll sleep in the corner
next to A-A-Tron.

1785792 1787530 Plenty of room
for you to stretch out, too,

1787530 1789939 'cause you're taller than I am.
Know what I mean?

1789939 1794042 Hey, D, what do you think
Sentinel's reaction would be
if you personally handed him

1794042 1797012 the Matrix of Leadership
that you found?

1797012 1799916 Okay, stop.
I know what you're
trying to do.

1799916 1802182 And it's
definitely working.
I'm in.

1802182 1804712 Hah, ha! Yeah, buddy.
How do we get
to the surface?

1804712 1806890 Pfft! You kidding me?
The surface?
1812755 1814755 Why is there so much trash? Ah!

1814755 1817131 Warn me
next time, please.
My mouth was open.

1820697 1822796 Waste-disposal trains
are the only vehicles

1822796 1824974 that go all the way
to the surface.

1824974 1827438 Yeah, but they
don't allow passengers.
The trains are autonomous.

1827438 1829836 Yeah, that's the
"won't be easy" part.

1829836 1832311 It's perfect.
We'll be safe
inside the train.

1839782 1841419 That's the last one.
Send 'er up!

1862607 1865839 Thanks for being an idiot,
whoever you are.

1865839 1868985 Turning you in will
definitely get me promoted
back up a rank or two.

1882889 1884902 She's headed to the engine!
Don't worry, I got this.

1887038 1889236 Hold on, let me explain!
We're on a mission!
1889236 1891403 So am I. To ruin your life.

1901943 1905021 Elita, wait. We found a message.
We know where--
1905749 1907881 This bot is crazy! Who is she?

1907881 1910422 Dead end, Elita.
There's no way...

1927901 1930838 Why? Why am I doing this?
Why am I doing this?

1995639 1997905 We know where
the Matrix of Leadership is.

1997905 1999940 Oh, sure.
And I'm really a Prime.

1999940 2003350 I just prefer loading
crates of toxic waste.

2003350 2005847 Whoa.
Where did you get this?

2005847 2007618 From my friend Steve.
Orion killed him.

2007618 2010093 I did not kill Steve.
He was never alive.

2011490 2013690 Sentinel told us
he was going to the surface,
2013690 2015593 and then we found this message.

2015593 2017826 We figured that we could
hand deliver it to him
2023999 2025702 This was too important to wait.
2026507 2028408 It will change all of our lives.

2031213 2034513 I'm not going to get demoted
again because of you.

2034513 2036383 I'm turning this rig around
and I'm notifying the--

2060838 2062541 Are you closing?
Don't close. Stop closing.

2070947 2073783 Oh, now I know why
no one comes to the surface!

2105817 2107619 Please stop
punching me in the face.

2110655 2113889 Where's the train?
Relax, okay? Here it comes.

2115924 2119059 Okay, I was wrong about that.
It was going the other way.

2126706 2131247 Okay, so I think
this is us,

2131247 2133777 and if we follow
the path to--
Now you listen to me,

2133777 2136351 Mr. "Zero Seconds
Since My Last Accident"!

2136351 2139453 I'll go on your little quest
because I don't have a choice.

2139453 2143325 But I carry the map, I navigate,
and if this leads to nothing,

2143325 2145921 then I'm dragging you
and those two idiot go-bots

2147329 2149991 and to the first
supervisor depot we see,

2149991 2152961 at which point you will explain
everything that's happened,

2154765 2157031 in a very positive light!
Got it?

2157031 2159308 Yeah, okay.
Deal. Great. All right.

2163279 2166678 Hi there. Uh, Elita, right?
Am I saying that right?

2168944 2172618 I'm B-127. You kneed me
in the face earlier, back there.

2172618 2175291 You can call me B,
or Badassatron.

2175291 2177051 It's a nickname
some of the guys gave me.

2177051 2179460 I don't know. I didn't give it
to myself or anything.

2190966 2193166 Badass--
I'm gonna need you
to talk less.

2194937 2196642 What am I talking less about,
my nickname?

2196642 2198941 That's fine with me.
Got some mountains over here...

2198941 2200844 Hey. You're thinking
about what you'll say

2200844 2202813 when you hand the Matrix
to Sentinel, aren't you?

2206388 2209853 So glad
I'm out here with you.
This was a great idea.
2209853 2211492 I'm just having a good time.

2211492 2213054 How much further
is the Matrix on the map?

2214561 2216530 This is the coolest thing
that has ever happened

2216530 2218499 to anyone anywhere,
I'm telling you!
2218499 2220897 ♪ Not one, not two Not three, but four ♪
2220897 2224164 ♪ Four best friends who are Walking through the door ♪

2225572 2227068 Hey, look,
there's more of it over here.

2227068 2229675 What is it?
It's not metal.

2229675 2233140 It's like some kind
of weird nature. It's weird.

2252060 2254601 I think this is not right.
We should go.

2287733 2290439 What do we do?
What do we do?
Shh! Quiet.

2301012 2303320 It's scanning for life-forms.
Move, move!

2353163 2355163 What-- What were they
searching for?

2355163 2357000 Someone to hug, B.
How should I know?

2357000 2359068 I'm not waiting around
to find out.

2361444 2364238 Quintessons haven't
been here for 50 cycles.

2364238 2366911 It doesn't make sense.
There's nothing out here.

2389430 2392508 A cave with teeth.
Nothing scary about that.

2399682 2402177 Knives coming
out of the ceiling. Amazing.

2403213 2404685 Everyone,
do we have to go insi--?

2406753 2409052 Why shouldn't we? Just walking
into the scariest place

2409052 2410559 I've ever seen
in my entire life.
2561536 2564372 But his spark is still lit.

2590596 2592807 Whoa, whoa, it's okay!
It's okay.

2621431 2625367 You deserved
so much better than this end.

2627974 2630812 We heard your message.
We've come to find
the Matrix.

2630812 2634013 Your transformation cogs.
What happened to you?

2641383 2642824 Well, we've had
to drill for Energon

2646256 2648489 That's why we came.
To fix things.

2648489 2650557 If we find
the Matrix of Leadership

2650557 2652295 and get it to Sentinel Prime,
he can fix--

2659434 2661271 What are you talking about?
Why would you say that?

2663174 2665308 He's been saving us from
the Quintessons ever since--

2665308 2669279 You have not been saved.
You've been living a lie.

2669279 2672282 I saw the truth
with my own eyes.

2681392 2684899 For thousands of cycles,
the war with the Quintessons
2692238 2696207 Until Sentinel, the principal aide to the Primes,
2699210 2704116 There was going to be a secret gathering of Quintesson commanders.

2706888 2713059 It was a mission so important,
we Primes took it on ourselves.

2713059 2717327 We agreed to meet Sentinel for
his sensitive intel in secret,

2727073 2729537 Hold the line!
Primus be with us!
2741221 2743353 We were outnumbered, but stood as one.

2780555 2783096 For all the power
of Cybertron.
2786332 2792666 But Sentinel never understood the true power of what he desired.
2792666 2796736 The Matrix of Leadership can only be wielded
2796736 2801708 by one that Primus himself deems worthy.

2812457 2818791 Wait. Hold on. You're saying
that the Matrix of Leadership
just vanished?

2820463 2822872 No, no, no. That is impossible.
I don't believe it.

2831012 2834510 With the new rulers
of Cybertron.

2902382 2905416 Keep your eyes open.
They always are.

2947997 2950428 Those are filled
with contaminated metal.

2952133 2954762 What do the Quintessons
want with toxic waste?

2981956 2984495 I know what
I promised you

2984495 2987630 but our mines,
they're running out!

2987630 2989830 There's barely
enough Energon for us.

2992404 2994637 I swear I will
get you the rest.

3002183 3004878 No miner gets a break
until I get my Energon.
3022799 3026405 Now you have seen the truth.

3032380 3037944 Every single day
of my life

3043015 3045886 Deep down,
I always felt
something was off.

3048394 3053564 Sentinel bought himself power
and then put us to work
paying off his debt.

3055335 3056864 Well, obviously,
I can believe it,

3056864 3058701 I just saw it,
but I still...

3063739 3065873 to my face.
It was all a sham.

3065873 3068711 How could we
have been so gullible?

3068711 3072352 Oh, this-- this is going
to change everything.

3077051 3079359 You just had to do it,
didn't you?

3081691 3083528 You just had
to go to the surface,
3085563 3088137 You just had to break protocol!

3088137 3090403 Who cares about protocol?
I do!

3092570 3095210 Because nothing bad happens
when you stay on protocol!

3095210 3096706 Sentinel Prime
has been forcing us

3096706 3099071 to work in the mines
until our gears strip,

3099071 3102778 and all the while he's been
giving the Energon away
to our greatest enemies!

3102778 3105781 And what do you think
he's going to do to us
when he finds out that we know?

3105781 3107882 I'm not thinking about
what he's going to do,

3107882 3109554 I'm thinking about
what we're going to do.

3111325 3113723 You're never thinking about
anything else, just yourself!

3113723 3118057 Fantastic!
Another Orion Pax master plan.
I can't wait to hear this.

3118057 3119432 Don't you want
to stop him?
3119432 3121335 No, I want to kill him!
3122602 3124272 I want to put Sentinel in chains

3124272 3125933 and march him
through the mines

3125933 3129475 so everyone can see him
for the false Prime that he is!

3129475 3133413 I want him to suffer
and then to die in darkness.

3134680 3136108 But we all know
that it doesn't matter

3137747 3141355 The fact is,
we're just cogless bots. Right?

3143018 3148197 We had limited options,
and now... now we have none.

3149497 3154467 No son or daughter of Cybertron
is born without a cog.

3154467 3157404 Oh, yeah.
I've been with myself
since I came online,

3157404 3160374 and this slot's
always been empty.

3160374 3162409 What are you saying?
Are you saying--

3162409 3166006 No. No way.
Nobody could be that evil,
not even Sentinel.

3166006 3170450 He removed your cogs
before you came online.

3170450 3175653 We were born with
transformation cogs,
but he...

3180856 3183331 ...is not the cog
in his chest

3183331 3188369 but the spark
that resides in their core.

3188369 3193704 A spark that gives you the will
to make your world better.
3194608 3198203 My fellow Primes had that spark.

3198203 3202251 And I see their strength
in you.

3203815 3210325 Take their cogs
and access
your full potential.

3219334 3225164 Warriors of noble spirit,
loyalty, strength.
3256032 3260441 They were one. You are one.

3276492 3279955 Wait. We have...
You-- You gave us...

3279955 3283464 The ability
to change your world.

3283464 3288634 How you choose
to use that power
is up to you.

3294904 3297610 Oh, yes!
Time to fight back!

3297610 3301482 No. You must return to
Iacon City and alert everyone.

3304685 3307983 Embedded in this
are the records
I have shown you.
3307983 3310458 Use it to reveal the truth.

3312823 3314957 This tunnel leads
to the mountains.

3314957 3317828 Cybertron's future
is in your hands.

3320963 3323735 Wait, we can't just
leave you here.

3323735 3326298 Your fight will come,
my friend.

3326298 3329675 Primus has a purpose
for us all.

3390230 3391935 I still think
we have better odds

3393706 3396742 Wait! We have cogs.
We can transform now.

3396742 3399712 That's right.
Everyone ready?
I was born ready.
3416663 3418192 How do we use these things?

3487129 3488669 We're alive!
I've never moved that fast.

3488669 3491463 That was incredible!
Did you see me slide all over?

3504509 3508183 I'm great. Are you kidding me?
We can transform!

3511989 3514090 We're wasting time.
We have to get back to Iacon.

3515289 3517027 back to Iacon is--
Here, I got it.

3518523 3520228 Don't worry, I got it.
Yeah, but be careful.

3520228 3523066 Our proof is inside and
you're spilling it everywhere.

3547387 3550225 You are still alive.
Would you look at that?

3558167 3561434 Primus will surely--
Uh-huh. Yes. Shut up.

3561434 3565240 I seized an opportunity
to take control of my future.

3565240 3566714 Anything to get
out of working for you

3566714 3569079 and that boring
council of elders.

3569079 3571279 Seriously,
I would watch you Primes

3571279 3573413 spend half the day
losing a war

3573413 3578253 and the other half
sitting around waxing poetic
about loyalty and honor.

3579551 3583390 Hear my words:
You will fall.
3583390 3585458 And a new Prime will rise--

3586998 3589935 I don't want to listen
to any more speeches.

3591266 3592740 There were others
in the cave with you.
3593807 3596942 They are to be your undoing.

3596942 3601375 You've lost, Sentinel.
Nothing you can do--

3607350 3610483 Oh, didn't I just say
no speeches?

3612122 3614553 This is what I'm talking about.
Unbelievable.

3614553 3617457 All of them are like that.
So disrespectful.

3644189 3647322 You've been a little quiet.
Are you all right?

3647322 3651656 All I can think about
is Sentinel's smirking face.

3651656 3655495 He must pay for what he's done.
Someone has to do something.

3655495 3659708 We are. With Alpha's proof
inside that device,
we will show everyone the truth.

3659708 3662810 You honestly believe
it'll be that easy?

3662810 3664812 Iacon doesn't want
to hear the truth.

3667078 3669113 There's got to be
a better way
to bring him down.

3669113 3671819 We have to trust everyone will
believe what we show them.

3676793 3682093 I will never trust
a so-called leader ever again.

3684691 3686427 There's only one bot
I know I can trust--

3729778 3732605 We're not spies.
But he is incompetent.

3732605 3736950 Scanning electrical impulses.
He speaks the truth.

3736950 3741515 That just means
he believes himself,
like any spy would.

3755364 3760072 One, we slowly
dismantle each of you
one bolt and screw at a time,

3760072 3762734 and really make sure
you feel it.

3763878 3765671 In exchange
for a quick death,

3765671 3768113 you give us intel
on the Energon trains,

3770115 3773822 or anything else that could
hurt your boss, Sentinel Prime.

3781192 3783095 I told you
it wasn't tight enough!

3786230 3788969 He's right.
I read all about you
in the archives.

3788969 3792401 You were
the most legendary warriors
in all of Cybertron.

3797109 3799738 Raise your hand
if "wave" is in your name.
There's a lot of "waves."

3801311 3803445 The yellow annoying one
is correct.
3804446 3806283 We were once the High Guard.

3806283 3810023 We witnessed
Sentinel's betrayal,
saw the Primes fall.

3810023 3812927 Since that day, we've been
fighting from the shadows,

3812927 3815655 doing whatever we can
to sabotage Sentinel.

3815655 3817393 That's great! We're--
Whoa, whoa, whoa.

3817393 3821100 Okay, okay.
We're good.
Everyone relax.

3823597 3825665 We were on our way
back to Iacon,

3825665 3829735 and now with your help,
we can unify Cybertron
against Sentinel Prime.

3829735 3833882 The idea of a unified
Cybertron is a myth.

3833882 3838744 All that counts is the strength
of one bot over another!

3840713 3843617 Okay. So, these guys
are a little intense.

3851660 3853726 I tell you
what I'm not doing.

3853726 3857664 I'm not cowering
in some busted ship,
playing king of the throne.

3857664 3859864 I'm not pretending
like I'm making a difference

3859864 3862603 by throwing one punch
and then running away to hide!

3862603 3864869 I found out
that Sentinel is rotten today,

3864869 3866871 and I'm gonna
make him pay for it.

3868378 3871986 You think you can insult me
and just walk away?

3871986 3876023 No one leaves here
unless I say so.
3878687 3880852 Well, how can you say so
3880852 3882821 with my head in your teeth?
3898903 3902181 Do it! Come on! Yeah, more!

3907914 3912884 You want to see the strength
of one bot over another? Huh?

3912884 3914963 Is that
all you've got, tough bot?
3914963 3917757 Let's go! Do it! Come on!

3937480 3940318 Stop!
D, he's not the enemy!

3944784 3947589 This is the last time
I show mercy!

3950262 3954893 You can stay here in hiding,
bowing before
your pathetic leader,

3954893 3958237 or follow me
as we march on Iacon

3958237 3961801 and I take down Sentinel
once and for all!

4021995 4024765 Engage all hostiles!
I've got the bridge!

4080053 4082691 I feel like someone
dropped a cliff on me.

4085232 4089027 Sentinel's troops
took as many prisoners
as they could carry.

4092701 4095275 And half of those
High-Guard nutjobs.
4101316 4103580 So, what do we do now?

4107782 4111423 Look at it. Look around.
This is a disaster.

4113161 4115086 I should have
stayed on protocol.

4121369 4124766 Listen to me.
I really want you to hear this.

4133348 4135106 I'm better than you
in every way,

4137614 4141321 You always have. You went back
into the mine to rescue Jazz.

4141321 4145292 You snuck up
to the surface to find
the Matrix of Leadership.

4145292 4147118 Yeah,
and how'd that work out?

4148889 4153157 that your instincts tell you
to break protocol for a reason.

4153157 4156270 This blind optimism
that you have

4156270 4160637 is why you make such bold
and courageous choices,

4163508 4166071 First time
giving a pep talk?

4167842 4171219 You can envision a better future
that no one else can see.

4172288 4175322 And if we ever want to see
B and D-16 again,

4175322 4179359 that is the Orion Pax
that we need right now.

4185730 4189369 Those Energon trains
will be heading
back to Iacon.

4192097 4195309 Hell yes, I can reroute it.
What else do we need?

4195309 4200039 Well, my bold instincts tell me
we have to recruit some nutjobs.

4202076 4204384 I was afraid
you'd say that.

4204384 4207981 Uh, Shockwave, Soundwave.
You in the back.

4207981 4211259 In order to save
our captured friends,
we have to act now.

4211259 4213558 How about I blast you
back to Iacon?
4213558 4216990 Oh! She punched me in my eye!

4216990 4220235 Everyone, shut up!
All of you. Listen to him.

4221700 4224063 Most likely, our friends
are being held captive

4224063 4225735 at the top
of Sentinel's tower.

4225735 4228771 A surprise attack would
give us a chance to rescue them.

4228771 4233743 Impossible. We do not
have enough soldiers
or a way inside.

4233743 4236911 Elita will get us in.
And I will get more troops.

4241388 4244622 Attention, High Guard.
Prepare for battle.

4264204 4267843 I don't understand.
Why are we still alive?

4267843 4271451 Look at this rowdy bunch!
The High Guard!

4271451 4273321 You know, you guys
have been tough to find.

4273321 4276918 Every trip to the surface,
I've been searching for you.

4276918 4279459 Tracking the bots in the cave
led me right to them.

4280790 4283727 You captured Starscream!
It was too easy.

4283727 4285927 I'm going to rip you apart
piece by piece

4285927 4287434 so that your death
is painful!

4287434 4288732 You'll regret
the day you were--

4290701 4293737 Oh, D-16,
what a tragic story you'll be.

4293737 4297642 Atop the leaderboard
in your sector
and secretly a traitor.

4297642 4299743 I'm not a traitor.
You're the traitor.

4299743 4302482 Nuh-uh. You, all of you,
are traitors.

4302482 4306178 You've been working
with the Quintessons
to sabotage my expeditions.

4306178 4308620 You're the reason
why I haven't found
the Matrix of Leadership yet.

4309918 4311524 Oh, trust me,
it'll be very true

4311524 4314461 when I'm executing you
in front of all of Iacon.

4314461 4318289 Because down here,
the truth is what I make it.

4330303 4333007 I'm not kneeling
in front of you.

4334976 4338210 You don't scare me.
You want to know why?

4340522 4343556 Because I don't have
anything left to lose.

4355328 4358406 Of course you were a fan.
Megatronus was
the coolest Prime!

4358406 4361299 The biggest!
The baddest! The toughest!

4362544 4364775 That's why,
after I killed him,
4365811 4368042 I took his cog for myself.

4368042 4370550 He was greater
than you'll ever be!
4370550 4372849 I don't know. I'm pretty great.

4372849 4375720 But I can understand why you'd
want to wear his face over mine.

4378021 4381253 Let's make sure
it doesn't come off.

4418765 4422261 You can't be serious.
We just worked
22 shifts without a break!

4422261 4423999 These miners need rest
and time to repair and--

4426298 4429741 So get back in the mines
before I make you
get back in the--

4435406 4437408 Who was that?
Did you see
who that was?

4446384 4448793 Yeah, I know I, uh,
look a little different.

4454095 4456933 Sentinel told us you died
from your race injuries.

4461938 4464105 Look, I know how this will sound
coming from me.

4464105 4467614 I was never
the most focused miner.

4467614 4470078 But as you can see,
everything is different now.

4477923 4482156 I went to the surface
and I learned the truth.

4485291 4489394 we were all born
with transformation cogs.

4490430 4493607 And then Sentinel,
he stole them from us.

4493607 4497006 He took away our ability
to make our own decisions.

4502981 4508820 But now, I'm offering you
your first real choice.

4508820 4512956 You can work a 23rd shift
and mine yourself to death

4514663 4517488 or fight back
against Sentinel with me.

4520161 4523538 How are we supposed to do that?
We can't fight.
We don't have cogs.

4525872 4529808 What defines a Transformer
is not the cog in its chest

4529808 4532778 but the spark
that resides in their core.

4532778 4536947 A spark that gives you the will
to make your world better.

4536947 4540819 And that spark,
Sentinel can never
take from us.

4540819 4543217 There's not enough of us.
We'd need an army.

4543217 4546990 And we have one.
Elita is bringing troops.
4546990 4549058 We are not alone in this.

4549058 4551863 If we want to be in control
of our own destiny,

4551863 4553524 we will have to
fight for it.

4553524 4556901 Now is the time
for us to stand up...

4565371 4569078 I promise you
this fight will be worth it.

4571751 4574655 Nothing can stop us
when we stand together.
4578186 4582696 Orion Pax! Orion Pax! Orion Pax!

4586524 4588801 Buckle up, Blinky.
We're going in.

4621427 4623396 You really were
a great miner.

4627908 4630337 We've got a breach!
Protect Sentinel!

4639579 4642151 They spotted us.
It's about to get bumpy.

4661634 4663777 There's too many.
We have to abort!

4677681 4679452 That's what
I'm talking about, Pax!

4691365 4696073 You can't win, miner.
I see everything!

4698977 4701716 Except the tower we're
about to crash into.
4727205 4729007 What has he done to you?

4729007 4731878 This is nothing compared to
what I'm gonna do to Sentinel.

4739745 4742086 I know how to stop him.
Airachnid is the answer.

4742086 4743857 I'm doing this my way.
D!

4758069 4761039 It appeared
when this guy tried to--

4761039 4763074 Knife hands?
I have knife hands!

4783963 4788297 Did you really think
that you could knock down
everything I've built?

4788297 4792136 It's over, Sentinel.
You can't escape the truth.
What truth?

4792136 4794842 That I plucked the cogs
from your newborn chests?

4794842 4797042 Forced you to mine
so that I could pay off
the Quintessons

4798406 4801409 None of that matters!
Because the truth...

4815458 4817095 He's too strong.
I have a plan.

4819295 4821561 We need her memory.
Where is she?

4860140 4863009 Orion! Orion, look!
I have knife hands!

4864604 4866804 I'm gonna cut these guys.
Watch. Come here!

4866804 4868674 You can jab them later.
We got to go.

4892335 4894568 Uh, excuse me.
You can't be in here.

4903511 4906349 These are not
the bad guys.
Why did you cut the door?

4906349 4908989 What? No, I didn't--
That was an-- I--

4908989 4910617 It was already like that.
Right?

4910617 4911959 Yes, that's right.
That's right, yes.

4911959 4914060 Yeah, it was already like--
Yes. Mm-hmm.
4920594 4923971 Stand by for a live transmission from Sentinel Prime.
4939085 4943221 That's why after I killed him, I took his cog for myself.
4945553 4949392 What truth? That I plucked the cogs from your newborn chests?
4949392 4951097 Forced you to mine so that I could pay off
4951097 4952956 the Quintessons and live like a king?
4954661 4956597 That I plucked the cogs from your newborn chests?
4956597 4958302 Forced you to mine so that I could pay off
4958302 4960469 the Quintessons and live like a king?
4960469 4962306 I'm working my miners as hard as I can.
4962306 4965276 I swear I will get you the rest!
4965276 4967443 I'm working my miners as hard as I can.
4967443 4970248 I swear I will get you the rest!
4970248 4972613 I'm working my miners as hard as I can, I swear--

5038151 5040318 Everyone in Iacon
knows the truth.

5041979 5045158 He took everything from us!
I have to do this!

5046819 5050526 Rebuilding Iacon
cannot begin
with an execution.

5050526 5053056 He deserves to die!
Can't you see that?

5053056 5056070 We're better than this.
Don't be like Sentinel.

5059733 5063803 you need to move
out of my way
before I move you myself.
5091503 5093866 Why did you do that? Why?
5213427 5216461 The Age of Primes has ended!

5218826 5223094 Follow me and you will
never again be deceived.

5228506 5231707 Rise up! Rise up!
Rise up!
5234072 5237207 your noble sacrifice for the greater good
5237207 5241255 has proven you worthy in the eyes of Primus.

5254257 5257667 I will lead us all
into the future!

5303418 5305913 He's gonna kill everyone.
We have to stop him.
Come on.

5309114 5312887 It's over when every last one
of his followers is dead!

5354357 5356568 We could've built
the future together.

5358603 5362200 After I tear down
everyone in my way!

5466944 5470143 We were given the power
to change our world
5470143 5472651 and you chose to destroy it.

5474114 5477986 You have betrayed Cybertron
and its citizens.

5495467 5498138 Take the High Guard
and leave.

5507853 5510183 It didn't have to end
this way.
5542050 5545218 is not as clear as I once believed.
5545218 5549156 Once it's crossed, there's no going back.

5555063 5557230 Oh, yeah.
Well, he's my hero.

5557230 5559067 The greatest Prime
to ever live.

5571684 5574214 You watch my back,
I promise to watch yours.

5597710 5602715 I could use some help
from a bot who is
better than me in every way.

5604684 5607082 I have a pretty sweet gig
working in waste management.

5607082 5610085 Well, Captain,
I do owe you a promotion.

5617389 5621360 And I'm sorry, B,
but I cannot let you
go back to sublevel 50.
5621360 5623197 I may be a Prime now,

5623197 5624935 but I'm gonna need you
by my side.

5624935 5628433 Are you serious?
This is the greatest
day of my life.

5628433 5630633 I get to work
for the government.
5666374 5670112 And now we stand here together as one...
5672512 5675645 proving we all have the power to transform,
5675645 5678890 to become who we were destined to be,
5678890 5683587 to right wrongs, to make our world better.
5686766 5689494 are the rights of all sentient beings.
5696536 5700142 This message is a warning to all Quintessons.

5740182 5742679 Hey, guys! Great news,
the Energon's back!

5742679 5744956 And I have a cog
and I can transform!

5744956 5746892 It's a long story.
I'll fill you in later.

5746892 5750456 Oh! And here's the best part.
My hands are straight-up knives.
6203975 6207715 But his death has given life to a new enemy.
6213184 6217362 We will not be blinded by his deception.

subtitles.author: ALL SUB
lines:
119734 121470 Okay, let's see
what we got here.
145593 149168 there was our gracious and powerful creator,
151863 156065 To protect our universe, he sacrificed his life force,
174358 178230 appointed to lead and protect future generations.
178230 182960 To assist them, Primus created an entity of great power,

185160 188163 The Matrix, there it is. Okay.
Good. Come on. Keep going.
188163 190836 With the Matrix in the Primes' possession,
190836 197348 Cybertron's natural power source, Energon, flowed in abundance,
203048 207358 Attention! Unauthorized movement detected in archival vault.
212561 217401 For generations, there was peace and prosperity,
217401 220833 until the Matrix of Leadership was lost,

224540 228709 Why does every legend
about the Matrix
end right there?

228709 230975 One of these
has to say what happened.
233241 235386 Oh, hey there. Halt, criminal! Prepare to--

242085 244659 Well, hello, guys.
I'm so glad you're here.
246056 247596 I must've taken a wrong turn.

247596 250434 It's that defective mining bot,
Oreon Pix!

251897 253932 We told you
to never come back here!

253932 256902 Why are we all yelling?
I'm gonna smash you!

256902 259575 Hold on.
Whoa, whoa, hold on.
No need for violence.

259575 263205 How about this:
I run away, you chase me.
We play that game. Huh?

263205 265240 Come on.
You're bigger, faster.
It'll be fun.

265240 268078 He doesn't have a cog.
Let's give him a head start.

268078 270949 Why not?
It's not like
he can transform.

283599 285293 Something that flies.
Something that flies.

360975 363041 Okay, fellas!
Thanks for the head start.

363041 364482 You want to give me
another one?

364482 366880 You're dead!
I'll take that as a no.

368717 370554 Oh...
What did you say, no-cog?

370554 372116 Sorry, sir,
I didn't mean you.

372116 373986 I was referring
to the bot

enough Energon for us.

2992404 2994637 I swear I will
get you the rest.

3002183 3004878 No miner gets a break
until I get my Energon.
3022799 3026405 Now you have seen the truth.

3032380 3037944 Every single day
of my life

3043015 3045886 Deep down,
I always felt
something was off.

3048394 3053564 Sentinel bought himself power
and then put us to work
paying off his debt.

3055335 3056864 Well, obviously,
I can believe it,

3056864 3058701 I just saw it,
but I still...

3063739 3065873 to my face.
It was all a sham.

3065873 3068711 How could we
have been so gullible?

3068711 3072352 Oh, this-- this is going
to change everything.

3077051 3079359 You just had to do it,
didn't you?

3081691 3083528 You just had
to go to the surface,
3085563 3088137 You just had to break protocol!

3088137 3090403 Who cares about protocol?
I do!

3092570 3095210 Because nothing bad happens
when you stay on protocol!

3095210 3096706 Sentinel Prime
has been forcing us

3096706 3099071 to work in the mines
until our gears strip,

3099071 3102778 and all the while he's been
giving the Energon away
to our greatest enemies!

3102778 3105781 And what do you think
he's going to do to us
when he finds out that we know?

3105781 3107882 I'm not thinking about
what he's going to do,

3107882 3109554 I'm thinking about
what we're going to do.

3111325 3113723 You're never thinking about
anything else, just yourself!

3113723 3118057 Fantastic!
Another Orion Pax master plan.
I can't wait to hear this.

3118057 3119432 Don't you want
to stop him?
3119432 3121335 No, I want to kill him!
3122602 3124272 I want to put Sentinel in chains

3124272 3125933 and march him
through the mines

3125933 3129475 so everyone can see him
for the false Prime that he is!

3129475 3133413 I want him to suffer
and then to die in darkness.

3134680 3136108 But we all know
that it doesn't matter

3137747 3141355 The fact is,
we're just cogless bots. Right?

3143018 3148197 We had limited options,
and now... now we have none.

3149497 3154467 No son or daughter of Cybertron
is born without a cog.

3154467 3157404 Oh, yeah.
I've been with myself
since I came online,

3157404 3160374 and this slot's
always been empty.

3160374 3162409 What are you saying?
Are you saying--

3162409 3166006 No. No way.
Nobody could be that evil,
not even Sentinel.

3166006 3170450 He removed your cogs
before you came online.

3170450 3175653 We were born with
transformation cogs,
but he...

3180856 3183331 ...is not the cog
in his chest

3183331 3188369 but the spark
that resides in their core.

3188369 3193704 A spark that gives you the will
to make your world better.
3194608 3198203 My fellow Primes had that spark.

3198203 3202251 And I see their strength
in you.

3203815 3210325 Take their cogs
and access
your full potential.

3219334 3225164 Warriors of noble spirit,
loyalty, strength.
3256032 3260441 They were one. You are one.

3276492 3279955 Wait. We have...
You-- You gave us...

3279955 3283464 The ability
to change your world.

3283464 3288634 How you choose
to use that power
is up to you.

3294904 3297610 Oh, yes!
Time to fight back!

3297610 3301482 No. You must return to
Iacon City and alert everyone.

3304685 3307983 Embedded in this
are the records
I have shown you.
3307983 3310458 Use it to reveal the truth.

3312823 3314957 This tunnel leads
to the mountains.

3314957 3317828 Cybertron's future
is in your hands.

3320963 3323735 Wait, we can't just
leave you here.

3323735 3326298 Your fight will come,
my friend.

3326298 3329675 Primus has a purpose
for us all.

3390230 3391935 I still think
we have better odds

3393706 3396742 Wait! We have cogs.
We can transform now.

3396742 3399712 That's right.
Everyone ready?
I was born ready.
3416663 3418192 How do we use these things?

3487129 3488669 We're alive!
I've never moved that fast.

3488669 3491463 That was incredible!
Did you see me slide all over?

3504509 3508183 I'm great. Are you kidding me?
We can transform!

3511989 3514090 We're wasting time.
We have to get back to Iacon.

3515289 3517027 back to Iacon is--
Here, I got it.

3518523 3520228 Don't worry, I got it.
Yeah, but be careful.

3520228 3523066 Our proof is inside and
you're spilling it everywhere.

3547387 3550225 You are still alive.
Would you look at that?

3558167 3561434 Primus will surely--
Uh-huh. Yes. Shut up.

3561434 3565240 I seized an opportunity
to take control of my future.

3565240 3566714 Anything to get
out of working for you

3566714 3569079 and that boring
council of elders.

3569079 3571279 Seriously,
I would watch you Primes

3571279 3573413 spend half the day
losing a war

3573413 3578253 and the other half
sitting around waxing poetic
about loyalty and honor.

3579551 3583390 Hear my words:
You will fall.
3583390 3585458 And a new Prime will rise--

3586998 3589935 I don't want to listen
to any more speeches.

3591266 3592740 There were others
in the cave with you.
3593807 3596942 They are to be your undoing.

3596942 3601375 You've lost, Sentinel.
Nothing you can do--

3607350 3610483 Oh, didn't I just say
no speeches?

3612122 3614553 This is what I'm talking about.
Unbelievable.

3614553 3617457 All of them are like that.
So disrespectful.

3644189 3647322 You've been a little quiet.
Are you all right?

3647322 3651656 All I can think about
is Sentinel's smirking face.

3651656 3655495 He must pay for what he's done.
Someone has to do something.

3655495 3659708 We are. With Alpha's proof
inside that device,
we will show everyone the truth.

3659708 3662810 You honestly believe
it'll be that easy?

3662810 3664812 Iacon doesn't want
to hear the truth.

3667078 3669113 There's got to be
a better way
to bring him down.

3669113 3671819 We have to trust everyone will
believe what we show them.

3676793 3682093 I will never trust
a so-called leader ever again.

3684691 3686427 There's only one bot
I know I can trust--

3729778 3732605 We're not spies.
But he is incompetent.

3732605 3736950 Scanning electrical impulses.
He speaks the truth.

3736950 3741515 That just means
he believes himself,
like any spy would.

3755364 3760072 One, we slowly
dismantle each of you
one bolt and screw at a time,

3760072 3762734 and really make sure
you feel it.

3763878 3765671 In exchange
for a quick death,

3765671 3768113 you give us intel
on the Energon trains,

3770115 3773822 or anything else that could
hurt your boss, Sentinel Prime.

3781192 3783095 I told you
it wasn't tight enough!

3786230 3788969 He's right.
I read all about you
in the archives.

3788969 3792401 You were
the most legendary warriors
in all of Cybertron.

3797109 3799738 Raise your hand
if "wave" is in your name.
There's a lot of "waves."

3801311 3803445 The yellow annoying one
is correct.
3804446 3806283 We were once the High Guard.

3806283 3810023 We witnessed
Sentinel's betrayal,
saw the Primes fall.

3810023 3812927 Since that day, we've been
fighting from the shadows,

3812927 3815655 doing whatever we can
to sabotage Sentinel.

3815655 3817393 That's great! We're--
Whoa, whoa, whoa.

3817393 3821100 Okay, okay.
We're good.
Everyone relax.

3823597 3825665 We were on our way
back to Iacon,

3825665 3829735 and now with your help,
we can unify Cybertron
against Sentinel Prime.

3829735 3833882 The idea of a unified
Cybertron is a myth.

3833882 3838744 All that counts is the strength
of one bot over another!

3840713 3843617 Okay. So, these guys
are a little intense.

3851660 3853726 I tell you
what I'm not doing.

3853726 3857664 I'm not cowering
in some busted ship,
playing king of the throne.

3857664 3859864 I'm not pretending
like I'm making a difference

3859864 3862603 by throwing one punch
and then running away to hide!

3862603 3864869 I found out
that Sentinel is rotten today,

3864869 3866871 and I'm gonna
make him pay for it.

3868378 3871986 You think you can insult me
and just walk away?

3871986 3876023 No one leaves here
unless I say so.
3878687 3880852 Well, how can you say so
3880852 3882821 with my head in your teeth?
3898903 3902181 Do it! Come on! Yeah, more!

3907914 3912884 You want to see the strength
of one bot over another? Huh?

3912884 3914963 Is that
all you've got, tough bot?
3914963 3917757 Let's go! Do it! Come on!

3937480 3940318 Stop!
D, he's not the enemy!

3944784 3947589 This is the last time
I show mercy!

3950262 3954893 You can stay here in hiding,
bowing before
your pathetic leader,

3954893 3958237 or follow me
as we march on Iacon

3958237 3961801 and I take down Sentinel
once and for all!

4021995 4024765 Engage all hostiles!
I've got the bridge!

4080053 4082691 I feel like someone
dropped a cliff on me.

4085232 4089027 Sentinel's troops
took as many prisoners
as they could carry.

4092701 4095275 And half of those
High-Guard nutjobs.
4101316 4103580 So, what do we do now?

4107782 4111423 Look at it. Look around.
This is a disaster.

4113161 4115086 I should have
stayed on protocol.

4121369 4124766 Listen to me.
I really want you to hear this.

4133348 4135106 I'm better than you
in every way,

4137614 4141321 You always have. You went back
into the mine to rescue Jazz.

4141321 4145292 You snuck up
to the surface to find
the Matrix of Leadership.

4145292 4147118 Yeah,
and how'd that work out?

4148889 4153157 that your instincts tell you
to break protocol for a reason.

4153157 4156270 This blind optimism
that you have

4156270 4160637 is why you make such bold
and courageous choices,

4163508 4166071 First time
giving a pep talk?

4167842 4171219 You can envision a better future
that no one else can see.

4172288 4175322 And if we ever want to see
B and D-16 again,

4175322 4179359 that is the Orion Pax
that we need right now.

4185730 4189369 Those Energon trains
will be heading
back to Iacon.

4192097 4195309 Hell yes, I can reroute it.
What else do we need?

4195309 4200039 Well, my bold instincts tell me
we have to recruit some nutjobs.

4202076 4204384 I was afraid
you'd say that.

4204384 4207981 Uh, Shockwave, Soundwave.
You in the back.

4207981 4211259 In order to save
our captured friends,
we have to act now.

4211259 4213558 How about I blast you
back to Iacon?
4213558 4216990 Oh! She punched me in my eye!

4216990 4220235 Everyone, shut up!
All of you. Listen to him.

4221700 4224063 Most likely, our friends
are being held captive

4224063 4225735 at the top
of Sentinel's tower.

4225735 4228771 A surprise attack would
give us a chance to rescue them.

4228771 4233743 Impossible. We do not
have enough soldiers
or a way inside.

4233743 4236911 Elita will get us in.
And I will get more troops.

4241388 4244622 Attention, High Guard.
Prepare for battle.

4264204 4267843 I don't understand.
Why are we still alive?

4267843 4271451 Look at this rowdy bunch!
The High Guard!

4271451 4273321 You know, you guys
have been tough to find.

4273321 4276918 Every trip to the surface,
I've been searching for you.

4276918 4279459 Tracking the bots in the cave
led me right to them.

4280790 4283727 You captured Starscream!
It was too easy.

4283727 4285927 I'm going to rip you apart
piece by piece

4285927 4287434 so that your death
is painful!

4287434 4288732 You'll regret
the day you were--

4290701 4293737 Oh, D-16,
what a tragic story you'll be.

4293737 4297642 Atop the leaderboard
in your sector
and secretly a traitor.

4297642 4299743 I'm not a traitor.
You're the traitor.

4299743 4302482 Nuh-uh. You, all of you,
are traitors.

4302482 4306178 You've been working
with the Quintessons
to sabotage my expeditions.

4306178 4308620 You're the reason
why I haven't found
the Matrix of Leadership yet.

4309918 4311524 Oh, trust me,
it'll be very true

4311524 4314461 when I'm executing you
in front of all of Iacon.

4314461 4318289 Because down here,
the truth is what I make it.

4330303 4333007 I'm not kneeling
in front of you.

4334976 4338210 You don't scare me.
You want to know why?

4340522 4343556 Because I don't have
anything left to lose.

4355328 4358406 Of course you were a fan.
Megatronus was
the coolest Prime!

4358406 4361299 The biggest!
The baddest! The toughest!

4362544 4364775 That's why,
after I killed him,
4365811 4368042 I took his cog for myself.

4368042 4370550 He was greater
than you'll ever be!
4370550 4372849 I don't know. I'm pretty great.

4372849 4375720 But I can understand why you'd
want to wear his face over mine.

4378021 4381253 Let's make sure
it doesn't come off.

4418765 4422261 You can't be serious.
We just worked
22 shifts without a break!

4422261 4423999 These miners need rest
and time to repair and--

4426298 4429741 So get back in the mines
before I make you
get back in the--

4435406 4437408 Who was that?
Did you see
who that was?

4446384 4448793 Yeah, I know I, uh,
look a little different.

4454095 4456933 Sentinel told us you died
from your race injuries.

4461938 4464105 Look, I know how this will sound
coming from me.

4464105 4467614 I was never
the most focused miner.

4467614 4470078 But as you can see,
everything is different now.

4477923 4482156 I went to the surface
and I learned the truth.

4485291 4489394 we were all born
with transformation cogs.

4490430 4493607 And then Sentinel,
he stole them from us.

4493607 4497006 He took away our ability
to make our own decisions.

4502981 4508820 But now, I'm offering you
your first real choice.

4508820 4512956 You can work a 23rd shift
and mine yourself to death

4514663 4517488 or fight back
against Sentinel with me.

4520161 4523538 How are we supposed to do that?
We can't fight.
We don't have cogs.

4525872 4529808 What defines a Transformer
is not the cog in its chest

4529808 4532778 but the spark
that resides in their core.

4532778 4536947 A spark that gives you the will
to make your world better.

4536947 4540819 And that spark,
Sentinel can never
take from us.

4540819 4543217 There's not enough of us.
We'd need an army.

4543217 4546990 And we have one.
Elita is bringing troops.
4546990 4549058 We are not alone in this.

4549058 4551863 If we want to be in control
of our own destiny,

4551863 4553524 we will have to
fight for it.

4553524 4556901 Now is the time
for us to stand up...

4565371 4569078 I promise you
this fight will be worth it.

4571751 4574655 Nothing can stop us
when we stand together.
4578186 4582696 Orion Pax! Orion Pax! Orion Pax!

4586524 4588801 Buckle up, Blinky.
We're going in.

4621427 4623396 You really were
a great miner.

4627908 4630337 We've got a breach!
Protect Sentinel!

4639579 4642151 They spotted us.
It's about to get bumpy.

4661634 4663777 There's too many.
We have to abort!

4677681 4679452 That's what
I'm talking about, Pax!

4691365 4696073 You can't win, miner.
I see everything!

4698977 4701716 Except the tower we're
about to crash into.
4727205 4729007 What has he done to you?

4729007 4731878 This is nothing compared to
what I'm gonna do to Sentinel.

4739745 4742086 I know how to stop him.
Airachnid is the answer.

4742086 4743857 I'm doing this my way.
D!

4758069 4761039 It appeared
when this guy tried to--

4761039 4763074 Knife hands?
I have knife hands!

4783963 4788297 Did you really think
that you could knock down
everything I've built?

4788297 4792136 It's over, Sentinel.
You can't escape the truth.
What truth?

4792136 4794842 That I plucked the cogs
from your newborn chests?

4794842 4797042 Forced you to mine
so that I could pay off
the Quintessons

4798406 4801409 None of that matters!
Because the truth...

4815458 4817095 He's too strong.
I have a plan.

4819295 4821561 We need her memory.
Where is she?

4860140 4863009 Orion! Orion, look!
I have knife hands!

4864604 4866804 I'm gonna cut these guys.
Watch. Come here!

4866804 4868674 You can jab them later.
We got to go.

4892335 4894568 Uh, excuse me.
You can't be in here.

4903511 4906349 These are not
the bad guys.
Why did you cut the door?

4906349 4908989 What? No, I didn't--
That was an-- I--

4908989 4910617 It was already like that.
Right?

4910617 4911959 Yes, that's right.
That's right, yes.

4911959 4914060 Yeah, it was already like--
Yes. Mm-hmm.
4920594 4923971 Stand by for a live transmission from Sentinel Prime.
4939085 4943221 That's why after I killed him, I took his cog for myself.
4945553 4949392 What truth? That I plucked the cogs from your newborn chests?
4949392 4951097 Forced you to mine so that I could pay off
4951097 4952956 the Quintessons and live like a king?
4954661 4956597 That I plucked the cogs from your newborn chests?
4956597 4958302 Forced you to mine so that I could pay off
4958302 4960469 the Quintessons and live like a king?
4960469 4962306 I'm working my miners as hard as I can.
4962306 4965276 I swear I will get you the rest!
4965276 4967443 I'm working my miners as hard as I can.
4967443 4970248 I swear I will get you the rest!
4970248 4972613 I'm working my miners as hard as I can, I swear--

5038151 5040318 Everyone in Iacon
knows the truth.

5041979 5045158 He took everything from us!
I have to do this!

5046819 5050526 Rebuilding Iacon
cannot begin
with an execution.

5050526 5053056 He deserves to die!
Can't you see that?

5053056 5056070 We're better than this.
Don't be like Sentinel.

5059733 5063803 you need to move
out of my way
before I move you myself.
5091503 5093866 Why did you do that? Why?
5213427 5216461 The Age of Primes has ended!

5218826 5223094 Follow me and you will
never again be deceived.

5228506 5231707 Rise up! Rise up!
Rise up!
5234072 5237207 your noble sacrifice for the greater good
5237207 5241255 has proven you worthy in the eyes of Primus.

5254257 5257667 I will lead us all
into the future!

5303418 5305913 He's gonna kill everyone.
We have to stop him.
Come on.

5309114 5312887 It's over when every last one
of his followers is dead!

5354357 5356568 We could've built
the future together.

5358603 5362200 After I tear down
everyone in my way!

5466944 5470143 We were given the power
to change our world
5470143 5472651 and you chose to destroy it.

5474114 5477986 You have betrayed Cybertron
and its citizens.

5495467 5498138 Take the High Guard
and leave.

5507853 5510183 It didn't have to end
this way.
5542050 5545218 is not as clear as I once believed.
5545218 5549156 Once it's crossed, there's no going back.

5555063 5557230 Oh, yeah.
Well, he's my hero.

5557230 5559067 The greatest Prime
to ever live.

5571684 5574214 You watch my back,
I promise to watch yours.

5597710 5602715 I could use some help
from a bot who is
better than me in every way.

5604684 5607082 I have a pretty sweet gig
working in waste management.

5607082 5610085 Well, Captain,
I do owe you a promotion.

5617389 5621360 And I'm sorry, B,
but I cannot let you
go back to sublevel 50.
5621360 5623197 I may be a Prime now,

5623197 5624935 but I'm gonna need you
by my side.

5624935 5628433 Are you serious?
This is the greatest
day of my life.

5628433 5630633 I get to work
for the government.
5666374 5670112 And now we stand here together as one...
5672512 5675645 proving we all have the power to transform,
5675645 5678890 to become who we were destined to be,
5678890 5683587 to right wrongs, to make our world better.
5686766 5689494 are the rights of all sentient beings.
5696536 5700142 This message is a warning to all Quintessons.

5740182 5742679 Hey, guys! Great news,
the Energon's back!

5742679 5744956 And I have a cog
and I can transform!

5744956 5746892 It's a long story.
I'll fill you in later.

5746892 5750456 Oh! And here's the best part.
My hands are straight-up knives.
6203975 6207715 But his death has given life to a new enemy.
6213184 6217362 We will not be blinded by his deception.

subtitles.author: avrilfan22
lines:
119755 121491 Okay, let's see
what we got here.
145614 149189 there was our gracious and powerful creator,
151884 156086 To protect our universe, he sacrificed his life force,
174379 178251 appointed to lead and protect future generations.
178251 182981 To assist them, Primus created an entity of great power,

185181 188184 The Matrix, there it is. Okay.
Good. Come on. Keep going.
188184 190857 [deep voice] With the Matrix in the Primes' possession,
190857 197369 Cybertron's natural power source, Energon, flowed in abundance,
203069 207379 [electronic voice] Attention! Unauthorized movement detected in archival vault.
212582 217422 [deep voice] For generations, there was peace and prosperity,
217422 220854 until the Matrix of Leadership was lost,

224561 228730 [groans] Why does every legend
about the Matrix end right there?

228730 230996 [sighs] One of these
has to say what happened.
230996 233262 [electronic voice] Halt, criminal! Prepare to be detained!
233262 235407 - Oh, hey there. - Halt, criminal! Prepare to--

242106 244680 Well, hello, guys.
I'm so glad you're here.

246077 247617 [chuckles]
I must've taken a wrong turn.

247617 250455 It's that defective mining bot,
Oreon Pix!

251918 253953 We told you
to never come back here!

253953 256923 - Why are we all yelling?
- I'm gonna smash you!

256923 259596 Hold on. Whoa, whoa, hold on.
No need for violence.

259596 263226 How about this: I run away,
you chase me. We play that game. Huh?

263226 265261 Come on. You're bigger, faster.
It'll be fun.

265261 268099 He doesn't have a cog.
Let's give him a head start.

268099 270970 Why not? It's not
like he can transform.

283620 285314 Something that flies.
Something that flies.

360996 363062 [chuckling] Okay, fellas!
Thanks for the head start.

363062 364503 You want to give me
another one?

364503 366901 - You're dead!
- I'll take that as a no.

368738 370575 Oh...
What did you say, no-cog?

370575 372137 Sorry, sir,
I didn't mean you.

372137 374007 I was referring to the
bot who was behind you.

375514 376977 The filthy
red and blue bot?

376977 378946 Has a big mouth,
squeaky joints,

378946 380651 gives off a corroded
metallic stench?

380651 382345 - Where is he?
- He went that way.

382345 384523 When I get
my hands on that bot...

395259 397899 Okay, D-16,
I may be a little rusty,

399571 401705 Let me guess. Chased
out of the archives?

401705 403773 [laughs] Yeah. I had to jump
out of a window this time.

405577 407810 And digging through ancient
data is worth dying for?
409174 410648 I need a new best friend.

410648 412551 If there are clues
in our recorded history

412551 414652 that can help locate
the Matrix of Leadership,

419415 421527 is up on the surface
right now,

421527 424761 risking his life for us
in search of the Matrix.

424761 427863 That's exactly what I'm doing.
I'm trying to help him.

431196 433363 the sooner we won't
have to mine for it.

433363 435706 Don't you want to choose your own path,
do whatever you want?

435706 438368 We're miners.
We mine, that's all.

438368 442878 No, there has got to be something
more I can do. I can feel it.

442878 444913 Oh, yeah? Like the time
you had a "feeling"

444913 446684 you could transform
without a cog?

446684 448477 You said you were never
gonna mention that again.

448477 450919 Took me three days
to pry you open.

450919 452052 Your feelings
get you in trouble.

453592 455825 - Just trust in Sentinel Prime.
- I do trust in him.
457598 459488 Hey, if we did have cogs--

459488 461765 I'd transform into a
shovel and beat you.

461765 463701 I don't like how fast
you answered that.

463701 466605 But listen, if you did beat me,
I couldn't give you this awesome

466605 468871 Megatronus Prime thing
I have here. It's cool.

468871 471841 - I'll give it to someone else.
- What Megatronus Prime thing?

471841 473711 Ah, it's nothing.
