has been forcing us

3096727 3099092 to work in the mines
until our gears strip,

3099092 3102799 and all the while he's been giving the
Energon away to our greatest enemies!

3102799 3105802 And what do you think he's going to
do to us when he finds out that we know?

3105802 3107903 I'm not thinking about
what he's going to do,

3107903 3109575 I'm thinking about
what we're going to do.

3111346 3113744 You're never thinking about
anything else, just yourself!

3113744 3118078 Fantastic! Another Orion Pax
master plan. I can't wait to hear this.

3118078 3119453 Don't you want
to stop him?
3119453 3121356 No, I want to kill him!
3122623 3124293 I want to put Sentinel in chains

3124293 3125954 and march him
through the mines

3125954 3129496 so everyone can see him
for the false Prime that he is!

3129496 3133434 I want him to suffer
and then to die in darkness.

3134701 3136129 But we all know
that it doesn't matter

3137768 3141376 The fact is,
we're just cogless bots. Right?

3143039 3148218 [D-16 chuckles bitterly] We had limited
options, and now... now we have none.

3149518 3154488 No son or daughter of Cybertron
is born without a cog.

3154488 3157425 Oh, yeah. I've been with
myself since I came online,

3157425 3160395 and this slot's
always been empty.

3160395 3162430 What are you saying?
Are you saying--

3162430 3166027 No. No way. Nobody could be that evil,
not even Sentinel.

3166027 3170471 He removed your cogs
before you came online.

3170471 3175674 We were born with transformation cogs,
but he...

3180877 3183352 ...is not the cog
in his chest

3183352 3188390 but the spark
that resides in their core.

3188390 3193725 A spark that gives you the will
to make your world better.
3194629 3198224 My fellow Primes had that spark.

3198224 3202272 And I see their strength
in you.

3203836 3210346 Take their cogs and
access your full potential.

3219355 3225185 Warriors of noble spirit,
loyalty, strength.
3256053 3260462 They were one. You are one.

3276513 3279976 Wait. We have...
You-- You gave us...

3279976 3283485 The ability
to change your world.

3283485 3288655 How you choose to use
that power is up to you.

3294925 3297631 Oh, yes!
Time to fight back!

3297631 3301503 No. You must return to
Iacon City and alert everyone.

3304706 3308004 Embedded in this are the
records I have shown you.
3308004 3310479 Use it to reveal the truth.

3312844 3314978 This tunnel leads
to the mountains.

3314978 3317849 Cybertron's future
is in your hands.

3320984 3323756 Wait, we can't just
leave you here.

3323756 3326319 Your fight will come,
my friend.

3326319 3329696 Primus has a purpose
for us all.

3390251 3391956 I still think
we have better odds

3393727 3396763 Wait! We have cogs.
We can transform now.

3396763 3399733 - That's right. Everyone ready?
- I was born ready.
3416684 3418213 How do we use these things?

3487150 3488690 - We're alive!
- I've never moved that fast.

3488690 3491484 - That was incredible!
- Did you see me slide all over?

3504530 3508204 I'm great. Are you kidding me?
We can transform!

3512010 3514111 We're wasting time.
We have to get back to Iacon.

3515310 3517048 - back to Iacon is--
- Here, I got it.

3518544 3520249 - Don't worry, I got it.
- Yeah, but be careful.

3520249 3523087 Our proof is inside and
you're spilling it everywhere.

3547408 3550246 You are still alive.
Would you look at that?

3558188 3561455 - Primus will surely--
- Uh-huh. Yes. Shut up.

3561455 3565261 I seized an opportunity
to take control of my future.

3565261 3566735 Anything to get
out of working for you

3566735 3569100 and that boring
council of elders.

3569100 3571300 Seriously,
I would watch you Primes

3571300 3573434 spend half the day
losing a war

3573434 3578274 and the other half sitting around
waxing poetic about loyalty and honor.

3579572 3583411 Hear my words:
You will fall.
3583411 3585479 And a new Prime will rise--

3587019 3589956 I don't want to listen
to any more speeches.

3591287 3592761 There were others
in the cave with you.
3593828 3596963 They are to be your undoing.

3596963 3601396 You've lost, Sentinel.
Nothing you can do--

3607371 3610504 Oh, didn't I just say
no speeches?

3612143 3614574 This is what I'm talking about.
Unbelievable.

3614574 3617478 All of them are like that.
So disrespectful.

3644210 3647343 You've been a little quiet.
Are you all right?

3647343 3651677 All I can think about
is Sentinel's smirking face.

3651677 3655516 He must pay for what he's done.
Someone has to do something.

3655516 3659729 We are. With Alpha's proof inside that
device, we will show everyone the truth.

3659729 3662831 You honestly believe
it'll be that easy?

3662831 3664833 Iacon doesn't want
to hear the truth.

3667099 3669134 There's got to be a better
way to bring him down.

3669134 3671840 We have to trust everyone will
believe what we show them.

3676814 3682114 I will never trust
a so-called leader ever again.

3684712 3686448 There's only one bot
I know I can trust--

3729799 3732626 - We're not spies.
- But he is incompetent.

3732626 3736971 Scanning electrical impulses.
He speaks the truth.

3736971 3741536 That just means he believes himself,
like any spy would.

3747773 3749313 [muffled speech continues]
Even when he was unconscious?

3755385 3760093 One, we slowly dismantle each
of you one bolt and screw at a time,

3760093 3762755 and really make sure
you feel it.

3763899 3765692 In exchange
for a quick death,

3765692 3768134 you give us intel
on the Energon trains,

3770136 3773843 or anything else that could
hurt your boss, Sentinel Prime.

3781213 3783116 [growls] I told you
it wasn't tight enough!

3786251 3788990 He's right. I read all
about you in the archives.

3788990 3792422 You were the most legendary
warriors in all of Cybertron.

3797130 3799759 Raise your hand if "wave" is in
your name. There's a lot of "waves."

3801332 3803466 The yellow annoying one
is correct.
3804467 3806304 We were once the High Guard.

3806304 3810044 We witnessed Sentinel's betrayal,
saw the Primes fall.

3810044 3812948 Since that day, we've been
fighting from the shadows,

3812948 3815676 doing whatever we can
to sabotage Sentinel.

3815676 3817414 That's great! We're--
Whoa, whoa, whoa.

3817414 3821121 Okay, okay. We're good.
Everyone relax.

3823618 3825686 We were on our way
back to Iacon,

3825686 3829756 and now with your help, we can
unify Cybertron against Sentinel Prime.

3829756 3833903 The idea of a unified
Cybertron is a myth.

3833903 3838765 All that counts is the strength
of one bot over another!

3840734 3843638 Okay. So, these guys
are a little intense.

3851681 3853747 I tell you
what I'm not doing.

3853747 3857685 I'm not cowering in some busted ship,
playing king of the throne.

3857685 3859885 I'm not pretending
like I'm making a difference

3859885 3862624 by throwing one punch
and then running away to hide!

3862624 3864890 I found out
that Sentinel is rotten today,

3864890 3866892 and I'm gonna
make him pay for it.

3868399 3872007 You think you can insult me
and just walk away?

3872007 3876044 No one leaves here
unless I say so.
3878708 3880873 Well, how can you say so
3880873 3882842 with my head in your teeth?

3898924 3902202 Do it! Come on! Yeah, more!
[crowd cheers]

3907935 3912905 You want to see the strength
of one bot over another? Huh?

3912905 3914984 [voice crackling] Is that
all you've got, tough bot?
3914984 3917778 Let's go! Do it! Come on!

3937501 3940339 Stop!
D, he's not the enemy!

3944805 3947610 This is the last time
I show mercy!

3950283 3954914 You can stay here in hiding,
bowing before your pathetic leader,

3954914 3958258 or follow me
as we march on Iacon

3958258 3961822 and I take down Sentinel
once and for all!

4022016 4024786 [Airachnid] Engage all hostiles!
I've got the bridge!

4080074 4082712 I feel like someone
dropped a cliff on me.

4085253 4089048 Sentinel's troops took as many
prisoners as they could carry.

4092722 4095296 And half of those
High-Guard nutjobs.
4101337 4103601 So, what do we do now?

4107803 4111444 Look at it. Look around.
This is a disaster.

4113182 4115107 I should have
stayed on protocol.

4121390 4124787 Listen to me.
I really want you to hear this.

4133369 4135127 I'm better than you
in every way,

4137635 4141342 You always have. You went back
into the mine to rescue Jazz.

4141342 4145313 You snuck up to the surface
to find the Matrix of Leadership.

4145313 4147139 [chuckles] Yeah,
and how'd that work out?

4148910 4153178 that your instincts tell you
to break protocol for a reason.

4153178 4156291 This blind optimism
that you have

4156291 4160658 is why you make such bold
and courageous choices,

4163529 4166092 First time
giving a pep talk?

4167863 4171240 You can envision a better future
that no one else can see.

4172309 4175343 And if we ever want to see
B and D-16 again,

4175343 4179380 that is the Orion Pax
that we need right now.

4185751 4189390 Those Energon trains will
be heading back to Iacon.

4192118 4195330 Hell yes, I can reroute it.
What else do we need?

4195330 4200060 Well, my bold instincts tell me
we have to recruit some nutjobs.

4202097 4204405 I was afraid
you'd say that.

4204405 4208002 Uh, Shockwave, Soundwave.
You in the back.

4208002 4211280 In order to save our captured friends,
we have to act now.

4211280 4213579 How about I blast you
back to Iacon?

4213579 4217011 [pained grunt]
Oh! She punched me in my eye!

4217011 4220256 Everyone, shut up!
All of you. Listen to him.

4221721 4224084 Most likely, our friends
are being held captive

4224084 4225756 at the top
of Sentinel's tower.

4225756 4228792 A surprise attack would
give us a chance to rescue them.

4228792 4233764 Impossible. We do not have
enough soldiers or a way inside.

4233764 4236932 Elita will get us in.
And I will get more troops.

4241409 4244643 Attention, High Guard.
Prepare for battle.

4264225 4267864 I don't understand.
Why are we still alive?

4267864 4271472 Look at this rowdy bunch!
The High Guard!

4271472 4273342 You know, you guys
have been tough to find.

4273342 4276939 Every trip to the surface,
I've been searching for you.

4276939 4279480 Tracking the bots in the cave
led me right to them.

4280811 4283748 - You captured Starscream!
- It was too easy.

4283748 4285948 [high-pitch] I'm going to
rip you apart piece by piece

4285948 4287455 so that your death
is painful! [laughs]

4287455 4288753 You'll regret
the day you were--

4290722 4293758 Oh, D-16,
what a tragic story you'll be.

4293758 4297663 Atop the leaderboard in your
sector and secretly a traitor.

4297663 4299764 I'm not a traitor.
You're the traitor.

4299764 4302503 Nuh-uh. You, all of you,
are traitors.

4302503 4306199 You've been working with the
Quintessons to sabotage my expeditions.

4306199 4308641 You're the reason why I haven't
found the Matrix of Leadership yet.

4309939 4311545 Oh, trust me,
it'll be very true

4311545 4314482 when I'm executing you
in front of all of Iacon.

4314482 4318310 Because down here,
the truth is what I make it.

4330324 4333028 I'm not kneeling
in front of you.

4334997 4338231 You don't scare me.
You want to know why?

4340543 4343577 Because I don't have
anything left to lose.

4355349 4358427 Of course you were a fan.
Megatronus was the coolest Prime!

4358427 4361320 The biggest!
The baddest! The toughest!

4362565 4364796 That's why,
after I killed him,
4365832 4368063 I took his cog for myself.

4368063 4370571 He was greater
than you'll ever be!
4370571 4372870 I don't know. I'm pretty great.

4372870 4375741 But I can understand why you'd
want to wear his face over mine.

4378042 4381274 Let's make sure
it doesn't come off.

4418786 4422282 [miner] You can't be serious. We
just worked 22 shifts without a break!

4422282 4424020 These miners need rest
and time to repair and--

4426319 4429762 So get back in the mines before
I make you get back in the--

4435427 4437429 - Who was that?
- Did you see who that was?

4446405 4448814 Yeah, I know I, uh,
look a little different.

4454116 4456954 Sentinel told us you died
from your race injuries.

4461959 4464126 Look, I know how this will sound
coming from me.

4464126 4467635 I was never
the most focused miner.

4467635 4470099 But as you can see,
everything is different now.

4477944 4482177 I went to the surface
and I learned the truth.

4485312 4489415 we were all born
with transformation cogs.

4490451 4493628 And then Sentinel,
he stole them from us.

4493628 4497027 He took away our ability
to make our own decisions.

4503002 4508841 But now, I'm offering you
your first real choice.

4508841 4512977 You can work a 23rd shift
and mine yourself to death

4514684 4517509 or fight back
against Sentinel with me.

4520182 4523559 - How are we supposed to do that?
- We can't fight. We don't have cogs.

4525893 4529829 What defines a Transformer
is not the cog in its chest

4529829 4532799 but the spark
that resides in their core.

4532799 4536968 A spark that gives you the will
to make your world better.

4536968 4540840 And that spark,
Sentinel can never take from us.

4540840 4543238 There's not enough of us.
We'd need an army.

4543238 4547011 And we have one.
Elita is bringing troops.
4547011 4549079 We are not alone in this.

4549079 4551884 If we want to be in control
of our own destiny,

4551884 4553545 we will have to
fight for it.

4553545 4556922 Now is the time
for us to stand up...

4565392 4569099 I promise you
this fight will be worth it.

4571772 4574676 Nothing can stop us
when we stand together.

4578207 4582717 [all chanting]
Orion Pax! Orion Pax! Orion Pax!

4586545 4588822 Buckle up, Blinky.
We're going in.

4621448 4623417 You really were
a great miner.

4627929 4630358 We've got a breach!
Protect Sentinel!

4639600 4642172 They spotted us.
It's about to get bumpy.

4661655 4663798 [alarm blaring] There's
too many. We have to abort!

4677702 4679473 [Elita] That's what
I'm talking about, Pax!

4691386 4696094 You can't win, miner.
I see everything!

4698998 4701737 Except the tower we're
about to crash into.
4727226 4729028 What has he done to you?

4729028 4731899 This is nothing compared to
what I'm gonna do to Sentinel.

4739766 4742107 I know how to stop him.
Airachnid is the answer.

4742107 4743878 - I'm doing this my way.
- D!

4758090 4761060 It appeared
when this guy tried to--

4761060 4763095 Knife hands?
I have knife hands!

4783984 4788318 Did you really think that you could
knock down everything I've built?

4788318 4792157 - It's over, Sentinel. You can't escape the truth.
- [Sentinel] What truth?

4792157 4794863 That I plucked the cogs
from your newborn chests?

4794863 4797063 Forced you to mine so that I
could pay off the Quintessons

4798427 4801430 None of that matters!
Because the truth...

4815479 4817116 - He's too strong.
- I have a plan.

4819316 4821582 - We need her memory.
- Where is she?

4860161 4863030 Orion! Orion, look!
I have knife hands!

4864625 4866825 I'm gonna cut these guys.
Watch. Come here!

4866825 4868695 You can jab them later.
We got to go.

4892356 4894589 Uh, excuse me.
You can't be in here.

4903532 4906370 - These are not the bad guys.
- Why did you cut the door?

4906370 4909010 What? No, I didn't--
That was an-- I--

4909010 4910638 It was already like that.
Right?

4910638 4911980 - Yes, that's right.
- That's right, yes.

4911980 4914081 - Yeah, it was already like--
- Yes. Mm-hmm.
4920615 4923992 Stand by for a live transmission from Sentinel Prime.
4937172 4939106 [Sentinel on recording] That's why after I killed him--
4939106 4943242 That's why after I killed him, I took his cog for myself.
4945574 4949413 What truth? That I plucked the cogs from your newborn chests?
4949413 4951118 Forced you to mine so that I could pay off
4951118 4952977 the Quintessons and live like a king?
4954682 4956618 That I plucked the cogs from your newborn chests?
4956618 4958323 Forced you to mine so that I could pay off
4958323 4960490 the Quintessons and live like a king?
4960490 4962327 I'm working my miners as hard as I can.
4962327 4965297 I swear I will get you the rest!
4965297 4967464 I'm working my miners as hard as I can.
4967464 4970269 I swear I will get you the rest! [crowd gasps]
4970269 4972634 I'm working my miners as hard as I can, I swear--

5038172 5040339 Everyone in Iacon
knows the truth.

5042000 5045179 He took everything from us!
I have to do this!

5046840 5050547 Rebuilding Iacon cannot
begin with an execution.

5050547 5053077 He deserves to die!
Can't you see that?

5053077 5056091 We're better than this.
Don't be like Sentinel.

5059754 5063824 you need to move out of my
way before I move you myself.
5091524 5093887 Why did you do that? Why?
5213448 5216482 The Age of Primes has ended!

5218847 5223115 Follow me and you will
never again be deceived.

5228527 5231728 Rise up! Rise up!
Rise up!
5234093 5237228 your noble sacrifice for the greater good
5237228 5241276 has proven you worthy in the eyes of Primus.

5254278 5257688 I will lead us all
into the future!

5303439 5305934 - He's gonna kill everyone.
- We have to stop him. Come on.

5309135 5312908 It's over when every last one
of his followers is dead!

5354378 5356589 We could've built
the future together.

5358624 5362221 After I tear down
everyone in my way!

5466965 5470164 We were given the power
to change our world
5470164 5472672 and you chose to destroy it.

5474135 5478007 You have betrayed Cybertron
and its citizens.

5495488 5498159 Take the High Guard
and leave.

5507874 5510204 It didn't have to end
this way.
5539532 5542071 [Optimus Prime] The line between friend and enemy
5542071 5545239 is not as clear as I once believed.
5545239 5549177 Once it's crossed, there's no going back.

5555084 5557251 Oh, yeah.
Well, he's my hero.

5557251 5559088 [both] The greatest Prime
to ever live.

5571705 5574235 You watch my back,
I promise to watch yours.

5597731 5602736 I could use some help from a bot
who is better than me in every way.

5604705 5607103 I have a pretty sweet gig
working in waste management.

5607103 5610106 Well, Captain,
I do owe you a promotion.

5617410 5621381 And I'm sorry, B, but I cannot
let you go back to sublevel 50.
5621381 5623218 I may be a Prime now,

5623218 5624956 but I'm gonna need you
by my side.

5624956 5628454 Are you serious? This is
the greatest day of my life.

5628454 5630654 I get to work
for the government.
5666395 5670133 [Optimus Prime] And now we stand here together as one...
5672533 5675666 proving we all have the power to transform,
5675666 5678911 to become who we were destined to be,
5678911 5683608 to right wrongs, to make our world better.
5686787 5689515 are the rights of all sentient beings.
5696557 5700163 This message is a warning to all Quintessons.
5700163 5705564 If you dare return to Cybertron, the Autobots will be waiting.

5740203 5742700 Hey, guys! Great news,
the Energon's back!

5742700 5744977 And I have a cog
and I can transform!

5744977 5746913 It's a long story.
I'll fill you in later.

5746913 5750477 Oh! And here's the best part.
My hands are straight-up knives.
6203996 6207736 But his death has given life to a new enemy.
6213205 6217383 We will not be blinded by his deception.

subtitles.author: avrilfan22
lines:
119755 121491 Okay, let's see
what we got here.
145614 149189 there was our gracious and powerful creator,
151884 156086 To protect our universe, he sacrificed his life force,
174379 178251 appointed to lead and protect future generations.
178251 182981 To assist them, Primus created an entity of great power,

185181 188184 The Matrix, there it is. Okay.
Good. Come on. Keep going.
188184 190857 With the Matrix in the Primes' possession,
190857 197369 Cybertron's natural power source, Energon, flowed in abundance,
203069 207379 Attention! Unauthorized movement detected in archival vault.
212582 217422 For generations, there was peace and prosperity,
217422 220854 until the Matrix of Leadership was lost,

224561 228730 Why does every legend
about the Matrix end right there?

228730 230996 One of these
has to say what happened.
233262 235407 - Oh, hey there. - Halt, criminal! Prepare to--

242106 244680 Well, hello, guys.
I'm so glad you're here.
246077 247617 I must've taken a wrong turn.

247617 250455 It's that defective mining bot,
Oreon Pix!

251918 253953 We told you
to never come back here!

253953 256923 - Why are we all yelling?
- I'm gonna smash you!

256923 259596 Hold on. Whoa, whoa, hold on.
No need for violence.

259596 263226 How about this: I run away,
you chase me. We play that game. Huh?

263226 265261 Come on. You're bigger, faster.
It'll be fun.

265261 268099 He doesn't have a cog.
Let's give him a head start.

268099 270970 Why not? It's not
like he can transform.

283620 285314 Something that flies.
Something that flies.

360996 363062 Okay, fellas!
Thanks for the head start.

363062 364503 You want to give me
another one?

364503 366901 - You're dead!
- I'll take that as a no.

368738 370575 Oh...
What did you say, no-cog?

370575 372137 Sorry, sir,
I didn't mean you.

372137 374007 I was referring to the
bot who was behind you.

375514 376977 The filthy
red and blue bot?

376977 378946 Has a big mouth,
squeaky joints,

378946 380651 gives off a corroded
metallic stench?

380651 382345 - Where is he?
- He went that way.

382345 384523 When I get
my hands on that bot...

395259 397899 Okay, D-16,
I may be a little rusty,

399571 401705 Let me guess. Chased
out of the archives?

401705 403773 Yeah. I had to jump
out of a window this time.

405577 407810 And digging through ancient
data is worth dying for?
409174 410648 I need a new best friend.

410648 412551 If there are clues
in our recorded history

412551 414652 that can help locate
the Matrix of Leadership,

419415 421527 is up on the surface
right now,

421527 424761 risking his life for us
in search of the Matrix.

424761 427863 That's exactly what I'm doing.
I'm trying to help him.

431196 433363 the sooner we won't
have to mine for it.

433363 435706 Don't you want to choose your own path,
do whatever you want?

435706 438368 We're miners.
We mine, that's all.

438368 442878 No, there has got to be something
more I can do. I can feel it.

442878 444913 Oh, yeah? Like the time
you had a "feeling"

444913 446684 you could transform
without a cog?

446684 448477 You said you were never
gonna mention that again.

448477 450919 Took me three days
to pry you open.

450919 452052 Your feelings
get you in trouble.

453592 455825 - Just trust in Sentinel Prime.
- I do trust in him.
457598 459488 Hey, if we did have cogs--

459488 461765 I'd transform into a
shovel and beat you.

461765 463701 I don't like how fast
you answered that.

463701 466605 But listen, if you did beat me,
I couldn't give you this awesome

466605 468871 Megatronus Prime thing
I have here. It's cool.

468871 471841 - I'll give it to someone else.
- What Megatronus Prime thing?

471841 473711 Ah, it's nothing.
Just a, you know,

473711 477011 mint-condition Megatronus Prime
decal, first edition.

478617 480476 If you don't want it,
I can just throw it away.

480476 482082 Throw it away? Don't--
That's not funny. Let me see.

482082 484480 Wait. Don't grab.
You're gonna crease it.

486660 489122 You know, Sentinel says
Megatronus was the--

489122 491025 The strongest Prime
to ever live.

492521 496701 - Looks good on you.
- Ah, it's really cool.
506570 509142 Approaching sublevel station. Stand clear of doors.

530968 533562 Metal to the pedal, drill bits.
This is it.

533562 536037 How much Energon have you mined
under my leadership?

537368 539370 And how perfect
is my mining record?

540877 543242 We are a mere

access your full potential.

3219355 3225185 Warriors of noble spirit,
loyalty, strength.
3256053 3260462 They were one. You are one.

3276513 3279976 Wait. We have...
You-- You gave us...

3279976 3283485 The ability
to change your world.

3283485 3288655 How you choose to use
that power is up to you.

3294925 3297631 Oh, yes!
Time to fight back!

3297631 3301503 No. You must return to
Iacon City and alert everyone.

3304706 3308004 Embedded in this are the
records I have shown you.
3308004 3310479 Use it to reveal the truth.

3312844 3314978 This tunnel leads
to the mountains.

3314978 3317849 Cybertron's future
is in your hands.

3320984 3323756 Wait, we can't just
leave you here.

3323756 3326319 Your fight will come,
my friend.

3326319 3329696 Primus has a purpose
for us all.

3390251 3391956 I still think
we have better odds

3393727 3396763 Wait! We have cogs.
We can transform now.

3396763 3399733 - That's right. Everyone ready?
- I was born ready.
3416684 3418213 How do we use these things?

3487150 3488690 - We're alive!
- I've never moved that fast.

3488690 3491484 - That was incredible!
- Did you see me slide all over?

3504530 3508204 I'm great. Are you kidding me?
We can transform!

3512010 3514111 We're wasting time.
We have to get back to Iacon.

3515310 3517048 - back to Iacon is--
- Here, I got it.

3518544 3520249 - Don't worry, I got it.
- Yeah, but be careful.

3520249 3523087 Our proof is inside and
you're spilling it everywhere.

3547408 3550246 You are still alive.
Would you look at that?

3558188 3561455 - Primus will surely--
- Uh-huh. Yes. Shut up.

3561455 3565261 I seized an opportunity
to take control of my future.

3565261 3566735 Anything to get
out of working for you

3566735 3569100 and that boring
council of elders.

3569100 3571300 Seriously,
I would watch you Primes

3571300 3573434 spend half the day
losing a war

3573434 3578274 and the other half sitting around
waxing poetic about loyalty and honor.

3579572 3583411 Hear my words:
You will fall.
3583411 3585479 And a new Prime will rise--

3587019 3589956 I don't want to listen
to any more speeches.

3591287 3592761 There were others
in the cave with you.
3593828 3596963 They are to be your undoing.

3596963 3601396 You've lost, Sentinel.
Nothing you can do--

3607371 3610504 Oh, didn't I just say
no speeches?

3612143 3614574 This is what I'm talking about.
Unbelievable.

3614574 3617478 All of them are like that.
So disrespectful.

3644210 3647343 You've been a little quiet.
Are you all right?

3647343 3651677 All I can think about
is Sentinel's smirking face.

3651677 3655516 He must pay for what he's done.
Someone has to do something.

3655516 3659729 We are. With Alpha's proof inside that
device, we will show everyone the truth.

3659729 3662831 You honestly believe
it'll be that easy?

3662831 3664833 Iacon doesn't want
to hear the truth.

3667099 3669134 There's got to be a better
way to bring him down.

3669134 3671840 We have to trust everyone will
believe what we show them.

3676814 3682114 I will never trust
a so-called leader ever again.

3684712 3686448 There's only one bot
I know I can trust--

3729799 3732626 - We're not spies.
- But he is incompetent.

3732626 3736971 Scanning electrical impulses.
He speaks the truth.

3736971 3741536 That just means he believes himself,
like any spy would.

3755385 3760093 One, we slowly dismantle each
of you one bolt and screw at a time,

3760093 3762755 and really make sure
you feel it.

3763899 3765692 In exchange
for a quick death,

3765692 3768134 you give us intel
on the Energon trains,

3770136 3773843 or anything else that could
hurt your boss, Sentinel Prime.

3781213 3783116 I told you
it wasn't tight enough!

3786251 3788990 He's right. I read all
about you in the archives.

3788990 3792422 You were the most legendary
warriors in all of Cybertron.

3797130 3799759 Raise your hand if "wave" is in
your name. There's a lot of "waves."

3801332 3803466 The yellow annoying one
is correct.
3804467 3806304 We were once the High Guard.

3806304 3810044 We witnessed Sentinel's betrayal,
saw the Primes fall.

3810044 3812948 Since that day, we've been
fighting from the shadows,

3812948 3815676 doing whatever we can
to sabotage Sentinel.

3815676 3817414 That's great! We're--
Whoa, whoa, whoa.

3817414 3821121 Okay, okay. We're good.
Everyone relax.

3823618 3825686 We were on our way
back to Iacon,

3825686 3829756 and now with your help, we can
unify Cybertron against Sentinel Prime.

3829756 3833903 The idea of a unified
Cybertron is a myth.

3833903 3838765 All that counts is the strength
of one bot over another!

3840734 3843638 Okay. So, these guys
are a little intense.

3851681 3853747 I tell you
what I'm not doing.

3853747 3857685 I'm not cowering in some busted ship,
playing king of the throne.

3857685 3859885 I'm not pretending
like I'm making a difference

3859885 3862624 by throwing one punch
and then running away to hide!

3862624 3864890 I found out
that Sentinel is rotten today,

3864890 3866892 and I'm gonna
make him pay for it.

3868399 3872007 You think you can insult me
and just walk away?

3872007 3876044 No one leaves here
unless I say so.
3878708 3880873 Well, how can you say so
3880873 3882842 with my head in your teeth?
3898924 3902202 Do it! Come on! Yeah, more!

3907935 3912905 You want to see the strength
of one bot over another? Huh?

3912905 3914984 Is that
all you've got, tough bot?
3914984 3917778 Let's go! Do it! Come on!

3937501 3940339 Stop!
D, he's not the enemy!

3944805 3947610 This is the last time
I show mercy!

3950283 3954914 You can stay here in hiding,
bowing before your pathetic leader,

3954914 3958258 or follow me
as we march on Iacon

3958258 3961822 and I take down Sentinel
once and for all!

4022016 4024786 Engage all hostiles!
I've got the bridge!

4080074 4082712 I feel like someone
dropped a cliff on me.

4085253 4089048 Sentinel's troops took as many
prisoners as they could carry.

4092722 4095296 And half of those
High-Guard nutjobs.
4101337 4103601 So, what do we do now?

4107803 4111444 Look at it. Look around.
This is a disaster.

4113182 4115107 I should have
stayed on protocol.

4121390 4124787 Listen to me.
I really want you to hear this.

4133369 4135127 I'm better than you
in every way,

4137635 4141342 You always have. You went back
into the mine to rescue Jazz.

4141342 4145313 You snuck up to the surface
to find the Matrix of Leadership.

4145313 4147139 Yeah,
and how'd that work out?

4148910 4153178 that your instincts tell you
to break protocol for a reason.

4153178 4156291 This blind optimism
that you have

4156291 4160658 is why you make such bold
and courageous choices,

4163529 4166092 First time
giving a pep talk?

4167863 4171240 You can envision a better future
that no one else can see.

4172309 4175343 And if we ever want to see
B and D-16 again,

4175343 4179380 that is the Orion Pax
that we need right now.

4185751 4189390 Those Energon trains will
be heading back to Iacon.

4192118 4195330 Hell yes, I can reroute it.
What else do we need?

4195330 4200060 Well, my bold instincts tell me
we have to recruit some nutjobs.

4202097 4204405 I was afraid
you'd say that.

4204405 4208002 Uh, Shockwave, Soundwave.
You in the back.

4208002 4211280 In order to save our captured friends,
we have to act now.

4211280 4213579 How about I blast you
back to Iacon?
4213579 4217011 Oh! She punched me in my eye!

4217011 4220256 Everyone, shut up!
All of you. Listen to him.

4221721 4224084 Most likely, our friends
are being held captive

4224084 4225756 at the top
of Sentinel's tower.

4225756 4228792 A surprise attack would
give us a chance to rescue them.

4228792 4233764 Impossible. We do not have
enough soldiers or a way inside.

4233764 4236932 Elita will get us in.
And I will get more troops.

4241409 4244643 Attention, High Guard.
Prepare for battle.

4264225 4267864 I don't understand.
Why are we still alive?

4267864 4271472 Look at this rowdy bunch!
The High Guard!

4271472 4273342 You know, you guys
have been tough to find.

4273342 4276939 Every trip to the surface,
I've been searching for you.

4276939 4279480 Tracking the bots in the cave
led me right to them.

4280811 4283748 - You captured Starscream!
- It was too easy.

4283748 4285948 I'm going to
rip you apart piece by piece

4285948 4287455 so that your death
is painful!

4287455 4288753 You'll regret
the day you were--

4290722 4293758 Oh, D-16,
what a tragic story you'll be.

4293758 4297663 Atop the leaderboard in your
sector and secretly a traitor.

4297663 4299764 I'm not a traitor.
You're the traitor.

4299764 4302503 Nuh-uh. You, all of you,
are traitors.

4302503 4306199 You've been working with the
Quintessons to sabotage my expeditions.

4306199 4308641 You're the reason why I haven't
found the Matrix of Leadership yet.

4309939 4311545 Oh, trust me,
it'll be very true

4311545 4314482 when I'm executing you
in front of all of Iacon.

4314482 4318310 Because down here,
the truth is what I make it.

4330324 4333028 I'm not kneeling
in front of you.

4334997 4338231 You don't scare me.
You want to know why?

4340543 4343577 Because I don't have
anything left to lose.

4355349 4358427 Of course you were a fan.
Megatronus was the coolest Prime!

4358427 4361320 The biggest!
The baddest! The toughest!

4362565 4364796 That's why,
after I killed him,
4365832 4368063 I took his cog for myself.

4368063 4370571 He was greater
than you'll ever be!
4370571 4372870 I don't know. I'm pretty great.

4372870 4375741 But I can understand why you'd
want to wear his face over mine.

4378042 4381274 Let's make sure
it doesn't come off.

4418786 4422282 You can't be serious. We
just worked 22 shifts without a break!

4422282 4424020 These miners need rest
and time to repair and--

4426319 4429762 So get back in the mines before
I make you get back in the--

4435427 4437429 - Who was that?
- Did you see who that was?

4446405 4448814 Yeah, I know I, uh,
look a little different.

4454116 4456954 Sentinel told us you died
from your race injuries.

4461959 4464126 Look, I know how this will sound
coming from me.

4464126 4467635 I was never
the most focused miner.

4467635 4470099 But as you can see,
everything is different now.

4477944 4482177 I went to the surface
and I learned the truth.

4485312 4489415 we were all born
with transformation cogs.

4490451 4493628 And then Sentinel,
he stole them from us.

4493628 4497027 He took away our ability
to make our own decisions.

4503002 4508841 But now, I'm offering you
your first real choice.

4508841 4512977 You can work a 23rd shift
and mine yourself to death

4514684 4517509 or fight back
against Sentinel with me.

4520182 4523559 - How are we supposed to do that?
- We can't fight. We don't have cogs.

4525893 4529829 What defines a Transformer
is not the cog in its chest

4529829 4532799 but the spark
that resides in their core.

4532799 4536968 A spark that gives you the will
to make your world better.

4536968 4540840 And that spark,
Sentinel can never take from us.

4540840 4543238 There's not enough of us.
We'd need an army.

4543238 4547011 And we have one.
Elita is bringing troops.
4547011 4549079 We are not alone in this.

4549079 4551884 If we want to be in control
of our own destiny,

4551884 4553545 we will have to
fight for it.

4553545 4556922 Now is the time
for us to stand up...

4565392 4569099 I promise you
this fight will be worth it.

4571772 4574676 Nothing can stop us
when we stand together.
4578207 4582717 Orion Pax! Orion Pax! Orion Pax!

4586545 4588822 Buckle up, Blinky.
We're going in.

4621448 4623417 You really were
a great miner.

4627929 4630358 We've got a breach!
Protect Sentinel!

4639600 4642172 They spotted us.
It's about to get bumpy.

4661655 4663798 There's
too many. We have to abort!

4677702 4679473 That's what
I'm talking about, Pax!

4691386 4696094 You can't win, miner.
I see everything!

4698998 4701737 Except the tower we're
about to crash into.
4727226 4729028 What has he done to you?

4729028 4731899 This is nothing compared to
what I'm gonna do to Sentinel.

4739766 4742107 I know how to stop him.
Airachnid is the answer.

4742107 4743878 - I'm doing this my way.
- D!

4758090 4761060 It appeared
when this guy tried to--

4761060 4763095 Knife hands?
I have knife hands!

4783984 4788318 Did you really think that you could
knock down everything I've built?

4788318 4792157 - It's over, Sentinel. You can't escape the truth.
- What truth?

4792157 4794863 That I plucked the cogs
from your newborn chests?

4794863 4797063 Forced you to mine so that I
could pay off the Quintessons

4798427 4801430 None of that matters!
Because the truth...

4815479 4817116 - He's too strong.
- I have a plan.

4819316 4821582 - We need her memory.
- Where is she?

4860161 4863030 Orion! Orion, look!
I have knife hands!

4864625 4866825 I'm gonna cut these guys.
Watch. Come here!

4866825 4868695 You can jab them later.
We got to go.

4892356 4894589 Uh, excuse me.
You can't be in here.

4903532 4906370 - These are not the bad guys.
- Why did you cut the door?

4906370 4909010 What? No, I didn't--
That was an-- I--

4909010 4910638 It was already like that.
Right?

4910638 4911980 - Yes, that's right.
- That's right, yes.

4911980 4914081 - Yeah, it was already like--
- Yes. Mm-hmm.
4920615 4923992 Stand by for a live transmission from Sentinel Prime.
4939106 4943242 That's why after I killed him, I took his cog for myself.
4945574 4949413 What truth? That I plucked the cogs from your newborn chests?
4949413 4951118 Forced you to mine so that I could pay off
4951118 4952977 the Quintessons and live like a king?
4954682 4956618 That I plucked the cogs from your newborn chests?
4956618 4958323 Forced you to mine so that I could pay off
4958323 4960490 the Quintessons and live like a king?
4960490 4962327 I'm working my miners as hard as I can.
4962327 4965297 I swear I will get you the rest!
4965297 4967464 I'm working my miners as hard as I can.
4967464 4970269 I swear I will get you the rest!
4970269 4972634 I'm working my miners as hard as I can, I swear--

5038172 5040339 Everyone in Iacon
knows the truth.

5042000 5045179 He took everything from us!
I have to do this!

5046840 5050547 Rebuilding Iacon cannot
begin with an execution.

5050547 5053077 He deserves to die!
Can't you see that?

5053077 5056091 We're better than this.
Don't be like Sentinel.

5059754 5063824 you need to move out of my
way before I move you myself.
5091524 5093887 Why did you do that? Why?
5213448 5216482 The Age of Primes has ended!

5218847 5223115 Follow me and you will
never again be deceived.

5228527 5231728 Rise up! Rise up!
Rise up!
5234093 5237228 your noble sacrifice for the greater good
5237228 5241276 has proven you worthy in the eyes of Primus.

5254278 5257688 I will lead us all
into the future!

5303439 5305934 - He's gonna kill everyone.
- We have to stop him. Come on.

5309135 5312908 It's over when every last one
of his followers is dead!

5354378 5356589 We could've built
the future together.

5358624 5362221 After I tear down
everyone in my way!

5466965 5470164 We were given the power
to change our world
5470164 5472672 and you chose to destroy it.

5474135 5478007 You have betrayed Cybertron
and its citizens.

5495488 5498159 Take the High Guard
and leave.

5507874 5510204 It didn't have to end
this way.
5542071 5545239 is not as clear as I once believed.
5545239 5549177 Once it's crossed, there's no going back.

5555084 5557251 Oh, yeah.
Well, he's my hero.

5557251 5559088 The greatest Prime
to ever live.

5571705 5574235 You watch my back,
I promise to watch yours.

5597731 5602736 I could use some help from a bot
who is better than me in every way.

5604705 5607103 I have a pretty sweet gig
working in waste management.

5607103 5610106 Well, Captain,
I do owe you a promotion.

5617410 5621381 And I'm sorry, B, but I cannot
let you go back to sublevel 50.
5621381 5623218 I may be a Prime now,

5623218 5624956 but I'm gonna need you
by my side.

5624956 5628454 Are you serious? This is
the greatest day of my life.

5628454 5630654 I get to work
for the government.
5666395 5670133 And now we stand here together as one...
5672533 5675666 proving we all have the power to transform,
5675666 5678911 to become who we were destined to be,
5678911 5683608 to right wrongs, to make our world better.
5686787 5689515 are the rights of all sentient beings.
5696557 5700163 This message is a warning to all Quintessons.
5700163 5705564 If you dare return to Cybertron, the Autobots will be waiting.

5740203 5742700 Hey, guys! Great news,
the Energon's back!

5742700 5744977 And I have a cog
and I can transform!

5744977 5746913 It's a long story.
I'll fill you in later.

5746913 5750477 Oh! And here's the best part.
My hands are straight-up knives.
6203996 6207736 But his death has given life to a new enemy.
6213205 6217383 We will not be blinded by his deception.

subtitles.author: Glaider
lines:
119734 121470 Okay, let's see
what we got here.
145593 149168 there was our gracious and powerful creator,
151863 156065 To protect our universe, he sacrificed his life force,
174358 178230 appointed to lead and protect future generations.
178230 182960 To assist them, Primus created an entity of great power,

185160 188163 The Matrix, there it is. Okay.
Good. Come on. Keep going.
188163 190836 [deep voice] With the Matrix in the Primes' possession,
190836 197348 Cybertron's natural power source, Energon, flowed in abundance,
203048 207358 [electronic voice] Attention! Unauthorized movement detected in archival vault.
212561 217401 [deep voice] For generations, there was peace and prosperity,
217401 220833 until the Matrix of Leadership was lost,

224540 228709 [groans] Why does every legend
about the Matrix
end right there?

228709 230975 [sighs] One of these
has to say what happened.
230975 233241 [electronic voice] Halt, criminal! Prepare to be detained!
233241 235386 Oh, hey there. Halt, criminal! Prepare to--

242085 244659 Well, hello, guys.
I'm so glad you're here.

246056 247596 [chuckles]
I must've taken a wrong turn.

247596 250434 It's that defective mining bot,
Oreon Pix!

251897 253932 We told you
to never come back here!

253932 256902 Why are we all yelling?
I'm gonna smash you!

256902 259575 Hold on.
Whoa, whoa, hold on.
No need for violence.

259575 263205 How about this:
I run away, you chase me.
We play that game. Huh?

263205 265240 Come on.
You're bigger, faster.
It'll be fun.

265240 268078 He doesn't have a cog.
Let's give him a head start.

268078 270949 Why not?
It's not like
he can transform.

283599 285293 Something that flies.
Something that flies.

360975 363041 [chuckling] Okay, fellas!
Thanks for the head start.

363041 364482 You want to give me
another one?

364482 366880 You're dead!
I'll take that as a no.

368717 370554 Oh...
What did you say, no-cog?

370554 372116 Sorry, sir,
I didn't mean you.

372116 373986 I was referring
to the bot
who was behind you.

375493 376956 The filthy
red and blue bot?

376956 378925 Has a big mouth,
squeaky joints,

378925 380630 gives off a corroded
metallic stench?

380630 382324 Where is he?
He went that way.

382324 384502 When I get
my hands on that bot...

395238 397878 Okay, D-16,
I may be a little rusty,

399550 401684 Let me guess.
Chased out of
the archives?

401684 403752 [laughs] Yeah.
I had to jump
out of a window this time.

405556 407789 And digging through
ancient data
is worth dying for?
409153 410627 I need a new best friend.

410627 412530 If there are clues
in our recorded history

412530 414631 that can help locate
the Matrix of Leadership,

419394 421506 is up on the surface
right now,

421506 424740 risking his life for us
in search of the Matrix.

424740 427842 That's exactly what I'm doing.
I'm trying to help him.

431175 433342 the sooner we won't
have to mine for it.

433342 435685 Don't you want
to choose your own path,
do whatever you want?

435685 438347 We're miners.
We mine, that's all.

438347 442857 No, there has got to be
something more I can do.
I can feel it.

442857 444892 Oh, yeah? Like the time
you had a "feeling"

444892 446663 you could transform
without a cog?

446663 448456 You said you were never
gonna mention that again.

448456 450898 Took me three days
to pry you open.

450898 452031 Your feelings
get you in trouble.

453571 455804 Just trust
in Sentinel Prime.
I do trust in him.
457577 459467 Hey, if we did have cogs--

459467 461744 I'd transform
into a shovel
and beat you.

461744 463680 I don't like how fast
you answered that.

463680 466584 But listen, if you did beat me,
I couldn't give you this awesome

466584 468850 Megatronus Prime thing
I have here. It's cool.

468850 471820 I'll give it
to someone else.
What Megatronus Prime thing?

471820 473690 Ah, it's nothing.
Just a, you know,

473690 476990 mint-condition Megatronus Prime
decal, first edition.

478596 480455 If you don't want it,
I can just throw it away.

480455 482061 Throw it away? Don't--
That's not funny.
Let me see.

482061 484459 Wait. Don't grab.
You're gonna crease it.

486639 489101 You know, Sentinel says
Megatronus was the--

489101 491004 The strongest Prime
to ever live.

492500 496680 Looks good on you.
Ah, it's really cool.
506549 509121 [electronic voice] Approaching sublevel station. Stand clear of doors.

530947 533541 Metal to the pedal, drill bits.
This is it.

533541 536016 How much Energon have you mined
under my leadership?

537347 539349 And how perfect
is my mining record?

540856 543221 We are a mere
30 units of Energon away

550998 553704 you are looking especially shiny
this morning. New polish?

553704 555706 Orion Pax,
I'm sorry that I somehow

555706 557499 gave you the impression
that we're friends.

558973 560711 Light up that wall!
Let's go! Ten seconds!

560711 562339 Happy to take
the lead today, Captain.

562339 563978 Feeling like I have
enough power in me

563978 565881 to drill down
and touch Primus myself.

565881 567542 You don't have
the touch or the power.

567542 569753 Ready positions,
rust buckets! Let's go!

569753 571689 She's in a good mood today.
Mm-hmm.

575055 576760 [Elita] Here we go.
This one won't be open long.

608187 610453 It's unstable!
We got to go, we got to move!
624775 627778 I repeat, the tunnel is closing!

627778 630946 You with me, D?
[D-16] On your six! Keep going!

638283 639449 Elita, we've got
a trapped miner.

645224 647589 It's closing!
Just grab your pack and go.
648832 651164 What? No, I didn't mean it!

661603 664309 Nothing much. Just normal
protocol-following stuff.

669248 671822 Orion Pax, could you please exit
the tunnel of death?
671822 673923 [Orion] Elita, it's about to get messy out there!

685869 687695 Hurry!
We're not gonna make it!

696574 698673 What the hell, Pax?
I told you to evacuate.

698673 701247 I did, eventually.
If I get fired because of you--

701247 703216 Oh, please.
They're not
gonna fire you.

705647 708716 What? Why? I followed
protocol to the letter.

708716 710652 That is true.
I was the one
who broke the rules.

712324 714623 Darkwing, please,
I've worked too hard
for this.

714623 717692 You are no-cog bots
with limited options.

722037 724039 Elita...
Next time,
why don't you stop and think

730111 733345 I may not have a cog,
but my finger can transform.

733345 736282 Guess which one?
I'll give you

3396742 3399712 That's right.
Everyone ready?
I was born ready.
3416663 3418192 How do we use these things?

3487129 3488669 We're alive!
I've never moved that fast.

3488669 3491463 That was incredible!
Did you see me slide all over?

3504509 3508183 I'm great. Are you kidding me?
We can transform!

3511989 3514090 We're wasting time.
We have to get back to Iacon.

3515289 3517027 back to Iacon is--
Here, I got it.

3518523 3520228 Don't worry, I got it.
Yeah, but be careful.

3520228 3523066 Our proof is inside and
you're spilling it everywhere.

3547387 3550225 You are still alive.
Would you look at that?

3558167 3561434 Primus will surely--
Uh-huh. Yes. Shut up.

3561434 3565240 I seized an opportunity
to take control of my future.

3565240 3566714 Anything to get
out of working for you

3566714 3569079 and that boring
council of elders.

3569079 3571279 Seriously,
I would watch you Primes

3571279 3573413 spend half the day
losing a war

3573413 3578253 and the other half
sitting around waxing poetic
about loyalty and honor.

3579551 3583390 Hear my words:
You will fall.
3583390 3585458 And a new Prime will rise--

3586998 3589935 I don't want to listen
to any more speeches.

3591266 3592740 There were others
in the cave with you.
3593807 3596942 They are to be your undoing.

3596942 3601375 You've lost, Sentinel.
Nothing you can do--

3607350 3610483 Oh, didn't I just say
no speeches?

3612122 3614553 This is what I'm talking about.
Unbelievable.

3614553 3617457 All of them are like that.
So disrespectful.

3644189 3647322 You've been a little quiet.
Are you all right?

3647322 3651656 All I can think about
is Sentinel's smirking face.

3651656 3655495 He must pay for what he's done.
Someone has to do something.

3655495 3659708 We are. With Alpha's proof
inside that device,
we will show everyone the truth.

3659708 3662810 You honestly believe
it'll be that easy?

3662810 3664812 Iacon doesn't want
to hear the truth.

3667078 3669113 There's got to be
a better way
to bring him down.

3669113 3671819 We have to trust everyone will
believe what we show them.

3676793 3682093 I will never trust
a so-called leader ever again.

3684691 3686427 There's only one bot
I know I can trust--

3729778 3732605 We're not spies.
But he is incompetent.

3732605 3736950 Scanning electrical impulses.
He speaks the truth.

3736950 3741515 That just means
he believes himself,
like any spy would.

3747752 3749292 [muffled speech continues]
Even when he was
unconscious?

3755364 3760072 One, we slowly
dismantle each of you
one bolt and screw at a time,

3760072 3762734 and really make sure
you feel it.

3763878 3765671 In exchange
for a quick death,

3765671 3768113 you give us intel
on the Energon trains,

3770115 3773822 or anything else that could
hurt your boss, Sentinel Prime.

3781192 3783095 [growls] I told you
it wasn't tight enough!

3786230 3788969 He's right.
I read all about you
in the archives.

3788969 3792401 You were
the most legendary warriors
in all of Cybertron.

3797109 3799738 Raise your hand
if "wave" is in your name.
There's a lot of "waves."

3801311 3803445 The yellow annoying one
is correct.
3804446 3806283 We were once the High Guard.

3806283 3810023 We witnessed
Sentinel's betrayal,
saw the Primes fall.

3810023 3812927 Since that day, we've been
fighting from the shadows,

3812927 3815655 doing whatever we can
to sabotage Sentinel.

3815655 3817393 That's great! We're--
Whoa, whoa, whoa.

3817393 3821100 Okay, okay.
We're good.
Everyone relax.

3823597 3825665 We were on our way
back to Iacon,

3825665 3829735 and now with your help,
we can unify Cybertron
against Sentinel Prime.

3829735 3833882 The idea of a unified
Cybertron is a myth.

3833882 3838744 All that counts is the strength
of one bot over another!

3840713 3843617 Okay. So, these guys
are a little intense.

3851660 3853726 I tell you
what I'm not doing.

3853726 3857664 I'm not cowering
in some busted ship,
playing king of the throne.

3857664 3859864 I'm not pretending
like I'm making a difference

3859864 3862603 by throwing one punch
and then running away to hide!

3862603 3864869 I found out
that Sentinel is rotten today,

3864869 3866871 and I'm gonna
make him pay for it.

3868378 3871986 You think you can insult me
and just walk away?

3871986 3876023 No one leaves here
unless I say so.
3878687 3880852 Well, how can you say so
3880852 3882821 with my head in your teeth?

3898903 3902181 Do it! Come on! Yeah, more!
[crowd cheers]

3907914 3912884 You want to see the strength
of one bot over another? Huh?

3912884 3914963 [voice crackling] Is that
all you've got, tough bot?
3914963 3917757 Let's go! Do it! Come on!

3937480 3940318 Stop!
D, he's not the enemy!

3944784 3947589 This is the last time
I show mercy!

3950262 3954893 You can stay here in hiding,
bowing before
your pathetic leader,

3954893 3958237 or follow me
as we march on Iacon

3958237 3961801 and I take down Sentinel
once and for all!

4021995 4024765 [Airachnid] Engage all hostiles!
I've got the bridge!

4080053 4082691 I feel like someone
dropped a cliff on me.

4085232 4089027 Sentinel's troops
took as many prisoners
as they could carry.

4092701 4095275 And half of those
High-Guard nutjobs.
4101316 4103580 So, what do we do now?

4107782 4111423 Look at it. Look around.
This is a disaster.

4113161 4115086 I should have
stayed on protocol.

4121369 4124766 Listen to me.
I really want you to hear this.

4133348 4135106 I'm better than you
in every way,

4137614 4141321 You always have. You went back
into the mine to rescue Jazz.

4141321 4145292 You snuck up
to the surface to find
the Matrix of Leadership.

4145292 4147118 [chuckles] Yeah,
and how'd that work out?

4148889 4153157 that your instincts tell you
to break protocol for a reason.

4153157 4156270 This blind optimism
that you have

4156270 4160637 is why you make such bold
and courageous choices,

4163508 4166071 First time
giving a pep talk?

4167842 4171219 You can envision a better future
that no one else can see.

4172288 4175322 And if we ever want to see
B and D-16 again,

4175322 4179359 that is the Orion Pax
that we need right now.

4185730 4189369 Those Energon trains
will be heading
back to Iacon.

4192097 4195309 Hell yes, I can reroute it.
What else do we need?

4195309 4200039 Well, my bold instincts tell me
we have to recruit some nutjobs.

4202076 4204384 I was afraid
you'd say that.

4204384 4207981 Uh, Shockwave, Soundwave.
You in the back.

4207981 4211259 In order to save
our captured friends,
we have to act now.

4211259 4213558 How about I blast you
back to Iacon?

4213558 4216990 [pained grunt]
Oh! She punched me in my eye!

4216990 4220235 Everyone, shut up!
All of you. Listen to him.

4221700 4224063 Most likely, our friends
are being held captive

4224063 4225735 at the top
of Sentinel's tower.

4225735 4228771 A surprise attack would
give us a chance to rescue them.

4228771 4233743 Impossible. We do not
have enough soldiers
or a way inside.

4233743 4236911 Elita will get us in.
And I will get more troops.

4241388 4244622 Attention, High Guard.
Prepare for battle.

4264204 4267843 I don't understand.
Why are we still alive?

4267843 4271451 Look at this rowdy bunch!
The High Guard!

4271451 4273321 You know, you guys
have been tough to find.

4273321 4276918 Every trip to the surface,
I've been searching for you.

4276918 4279459 Tracking the bots in the cave
led me right to them.

4280790 4283727 You captured Starscream!
It was too easy.

4283727 4285927 [high-pitch]
I'm going to rip you apart
piece by piece

4285927 4287434 so that your death
is painful!
[laughs]

4287434 4288732 You'll regret
the day you were--

4290701 4293737 Oh, D-16,
what a tragic story you'll be.

4293737 4297642 Atop the leaderboard
in your sector
and secretly a traitor.

4297642 4299743 I'm not a traitor.
You're the traitor.

4299743 4302482 Nuh-uh. You, all of you,
are traitors.

4302482 4306178 You've been working
with the Quintessons
to sabotage my expeditions.

4306178 4308620 You're the reason
why I haven't found
the Matrix of Leadership yet.

4309918 4311524 Oh, trust me,
it'll be very true

4311524 4314461 when I'm executing you
in front of all of Iacon.

4314461 4318289 Because down here,
the truth is what I make it.

4330303 4333007 I'm not kneeling
in front of you.

4334976 4338210 You don't scare me.
You want to know why?

4340522 4343556 Because I don't have
anything left to lose.

4355328 4358406 Of course you were a fan.
Megatronus was
the coolest Prime!

4358406 4361299 The biggest!
The baddest! The toughest!

4362544 4364775 That's why,
after I killed him,
4365811 4368042 I took his cog for myself.

4368042 4370550 He was greater
than you'll ever be!
4370550 4372849 I don't know. I'm pretty great.

4372849 4375720 But I can understand why you'd
want to wear his face over mine.

4378021 4381253 Let's make sure
it doesn't come off.

4418765 4422261 [miner] You can't be serious.
We just worked
22 shifts without a break!

4422261 4423999 These miners need rest
and time to repair and--

4426298 4429741 So get back in the mines
before I make you
get back in the--

4435406 4437408 Who was that?
Did you see
who that was?

4446384 4448793 Yeah, I know I, uh,
look a little different.

4454095 4456933 Sentinel told us you died
from your race injuries.

4461938 4464105 Look, I know how this will sound
coming from me.

4464105 4467614 I was never
the most focused miner.

4467614 4470078 But as you can see,
everything is different now.

4477923 4482156 I went to the surface
and I learned the truth.

4485291 4489394 we were all born
with transformation cogs.

4490430 4493607 And then Sentinel,
he stole them from us.

4493607 4497006 He took away our ability
to make our own decisions.

4502981 4508820 But now, I'm offering you
your first real choice.

4508820 4512956 You can work a 23rd shift
and mine yourself to death

4514663 4517488 or fight back
against Sentinel with me.

4520161 4523538 How are we supposed to do that?
We can't fight.
We don't have cogs.

4525872 4529808 What defines a Transformer
is not the cog in its chest

4529808 4532778 but the spark
that resides in their core.

4532778 4536947 A spark that gives you the will
to make your world better.

4536947 4540819 And that spark,
Sentinel can never
take from us.

4540819 4543217 There's not enough of us.
We'd need an army.

4543217 4546990 And we have one.
Elita is bringing troops.
4546990 4549058 We are not alone in this.

4549058 4551863 If we want to be in control
of our own destiny,

4551863 4553524 we will have to
fight for it.

4553524 4556901 Now is the time
for us to stand up...

4565371 4569078 I promise you
this fight will be worth it.

4571751 4574655 Nothing can stop us
when we stand together.

4578186 4582696 [all chanting]
Orion Pax! Orion Pax! Orion Pax!

4586524 4588801 Buckle up, Blinky.
We're going in.

4621427 4623396 You really were
a great miner.

4627908 4630337 We've got a breach!
Protect Sentinel!

4639579 4642151 They spotted us.
It's about to get bumpy.

4661634 4663777 [alarm blaring]
There's too many.
We have to abort!

4677681 4679452 [Elita] That's what
I'm talking about, Pax!

4691365 4696073 You can't win, miner.
I see everything!

4698977 4701716 Except the tower we're
about to crash into.
4727205 4729007 What has he done to you?

4729007 4731878 This is nothing compared to
what I'm gonna do to Sentinel.

4739745 4742086 I know how to stop him.
Airachnid is the answer.

4742086 4743857 I'm doing this my way.
D!

4758069 4761039 It appeared
when this guy tried to--

4761039 4763074 Knife hands?
I have knife hands!

4783963 4788297 Did you really think
that you could knock down
everything I've built?

4788297 4792136 It's over, Sentinel.
You can't escape the truth.
[Sentinel] What truth?

4792136 4794842 That I plucked the cogs
from your newborn chests?

4794842 4797042 Forced you to mine
so that I could pay off
the Quintessons

4798406 4801409 None of that matters!
Because the truth...

4815458 4817095 He's too strong.
I have a plan.

4819295 4821561 We need her memory.
Where is she?

4860140 4863009 Orion! Orion, look!
I have knife hands!

4864604 4866804 I'm gonna cut these guys.
Watch. Come here!

4866804 4868674 You can jab them later.
We got to go.

4892335 4894568 Uh, excuse me.
You can't be in here.

4903511 4906349 These are not
the bad guys.
Why did you cut the door?

4906349 4908989 What? No, I didn't--
That was an-- I--

4908989 4910617 It was already like that.
Right?

4910617 4911959 Yes, that's right.
That's right, yes.

4911959 4914060 Yeah, it was already like--
Yes. Mm-hmm.
4920594 4923971 Stand by for a live transmission from Sentinel Prime.
4937151 4939085 [Sentinel on recording] That's why after I killed him--
4939085 4943221 That's why after I killed him, I took his cog for myself.
4945553 4949392 What truth? That I plucked the cogs from your newborn chests?
4949392 4951097 Forced you to mine so that I could pay off
4951097 4952956 the Quintessons and live like a king?
4954661 4956597 That I plucked the cogs from your newborn chests?
4956597 4958302 Forced you to mine so that I could pay off
4958302 4960469 the Quintessons and live like a king?
4960469 4962306 I'm working my miners as hard as I can.
4962306 4965276 I swear I will get you the rest!
4965276 4967443 I'm working my miners as hard as I can.
4967443 4970248 I swear I will get you the rest! [crowd gasps]
4970248 4972613 I'm working my miners as hard as I can, I swear--

5038151 5040318 Everyone in Iacon
knows the truth.

5041979 5045158 He took everything from us!
I have to do this!

5046819 5050526 Rebuilding Iacon
cannot begin
with an execution.

5050526 5053056 He deserves to die!
Can't you see that?

5053056 5056070 We're better than this.
Don't be like Sentinel.

5059733 5063803 you need to move
out of my way
before I move you myself.
5091503 5093866 Why did you do that? Why?
5213427 5216461 The Age of Primes has ended!

5218826 5223094 Follow me and you will
never again be deceived.

5228506 5231707 Rise up! Rise up!
Rise up!
5234072 5237207 your noble sacrifice for the greater good
5237207 5241255 has proven you worthy in the eyes of Primus.

5254257 5257667 I will lead us all
into the future!

5303418 5305913 He's gonna kill everyone.
We have to stop him.
Come on.

5309114 5312887 It's over when every last one
of his followers is dead!

5354357 5356568 We could've built
the future together.

5358603 5362200 After I tear down
everyone in my way!

5466944 5470143 We were given the power
to change our world
5470143 5472651 and you chose to destroy it.

5474114 5477986 You have betrayed Cybertron
and its citizens.

5495467 5498138 Take the High Guard
and leave.

5507853 5510183 It didn't have to end
this way.
5539511 5542050 [Optimus Prime] The line between friend and enemy
5542050 5545218 is not as clear as I once believed.
5545218 5549156 Once it's crossed, there's no going back.

5555063 5557230 Oh, yeah.
Well, he's my hero.

5557230 5559067 [both] The greatest Prime
to ever live.

5571684 5574214 You watch my back,
I promise to watch yours.

5597710 5602715 I could use some help
from a bot who is
better than me in every way.

5604684 5607082 I have a pretty sweet gig
working in waste management.

5607082 5610085 Well, Captain,
I do owe you a promotion.

5617389 5621360 And I'm sorry, B,
but I cannot let you
go back to sublevel 50.
5621360 5623197 I may be a Prime now,

5623197 5624935 but I'm gonna need you
by my side.

5624935 5628433 Are you serious?
This is the greatest
day of my life.

5628433 5630633 I get to work
for the government.
5666374 5670112 [Optimus Prime] And now we stand here together as one...
5672512 5675645 proving we all have the power to transform,
5675645 5678890 to become who we were destined to be,
5678890 5683587 to right wrongs, to make our world better.
5686766 5689494 are the rights of all sentient beings.
5696536 5700142 This message is a warning to all Quintessons.

5740182 5742679 Hey, guys! Great news,
the Energon's back!

5742679 5744956 And I have a cog
and I can transform!

5744956 5746892 It's a long story.
I'll fill you in later.

5746892 5750456 Oh! And here's the best part.
My hands are straight-up knives.
6203975 6207715 But his death has given life to a new enemy.
6213184 6217362 We will not be blinded by his deception.

subtitles.author: Glaider
lines:
119734 121470 Okay, let's see
what we got here.
145593 149168 there was our gracious and powerful creator,
151863 156065 To protect our universe, he sacrificed his life force,
174358 178230 appointed to lead and protect future generations.
178230 182960 To assist them, Primus created an entity of great power,

185160 188163 The Matrix, there it is. Okay.
Good. Come on. Keep going.
188163 190836 With the Matrix in the Primes' possession,
190836 197348 Cybertron's natural power source, Energon, flowed in abundance,
203048 207358 Attention! Unauthorized movement detected in archival vault.
212561 217401 For generations, there was peace and prosperity,
217401 220833 until the Matrix of Leadership was lost,

224540 228709 Why does every legend
about the Matrix
end right there?

228709 230975 One of these
has to say what happened.
233241 235386 Oh, hey there. Halt, criminal! Prepare to--

242085 244659 Well, hello, guys.
I'm so glad you're here.
246056 247596 I must've taken a wrong turn.

247596 250434 It's that defective mining bot,
Oreon Pix!

251897 253932 We told you
to never come back here!

253932 256902 Why are we all yelling?
I'm gonna smash you!

256902 259575 Hold on.
Whoa, whoa, hold on.
No need for violence.

259575 263205 How about this:
I run away, you chase me.
We play that game. Huh?

263205 265240 Come on.
You're bigger, faster.
It'll be fun.

265240 268078 He doesn't have a cog.
Let's give him a head start.

268078 270949 Why not?
It's not like
he can transform.

283599 285293 Something that flies.
Something that flies.

360975 363041 Okay, fellas!
Thanks for the head start.

363041 364482 You want to give me
another one?

364482 366880 You're dead!
I'll take that as a no.

368717 370554 Oh...
What did you say, no-cog?

370554 372116 Sorry, sir,
I didn't mean you.

372116 373986 I was referring
to the bot
who was behind you.

375493 376956 The filthy
red and blue bot?

376956 378925 Has a big mouth,
squeaky joints,

378925 380630 gives off a corroded
metallic stench?

380630 382324 Where is he?
He went that way.

382324 384502 When I get
my hands on that bot...

395238 397878 Okay, D-16,
I may be a little rusty,

399550 401684 Let me guess.
Chased out of
the archives?

401684 403752 Yeah.
I had to jump
out of a window this time.

405556 407789 And digging through
ancient data
is worth dying for?
409153 410627 I need a new best friend.

410627 412530 If there are clues
in our recorded history

412530 414631 that can help locate
the Matrix of Leadership,

419394 421506 is up on the surface
right now,

421506 424740 risking his life for us
in search of the Matrix.

424740 427842 That's exactly what I'm doing.
I'm trying to help him.

431175 433342 the sooner we won't
have to mine for it.

433342 435685 Don't you want
to choose your own path,
do whatever you want?

435685 438347 We're miners.
We mine, that's all.

438347 442857 No, there has got to be
something more I can do.
I can feel it.

442857 444892 Oh, yeah? Like the time
you had a "feeling"

444892 446663 you could transform
without a cog?

446663 448456 You said you were never
gonna mention that again.

448456 450898 Took me three days
to pry you open.

450898 452031 Your feelings
get you in trouble.

453571 455804 Just trust
in Sentinel Prime.
I do trust in him.
457577 459467 Hey, if we did have cogs--

459467 461744 I'd transform
into a shovel
and beat you.

461744 463680 I don't like how fast
you answered that.

463680 466584 But listen, if you did beat me,
I couldn't give you this awesome

466584 468850 Megatronus Prime thing
I have here. It's cool.

468850 471820 I'll give it
to someone else.
What Megatronus Prime thing?

471820 473690 Ah, it's nothing.
Just a, you know,

473690 476990 mint-condition Megatronus Prime
decal, first edition.

478596 480455 If you don't want it,
I can just throw it away.

480455 482061 Throw it away? Don't--
That's not funny.
Let me see.

482061 484459 Wait. Don't grab.
You're gonna crease it.

486639 489101 You know, Sentinel says
Megatronus was the--

489101 491004 The strongest Prime
to ever live.

492500 496680 Looks good on you.
Ah, it's really cool.
506549 509121 Approaching sublevel station. Stand clear of doors.

530947 533541 Metal to the pedal, drill bits.
This is it.

533541 536016 How much Energon have you mined
under my leadership?

537347 539349 And how perfect
is my mining record?

540856 543221 We are a mere
30 units of Energon away

550998 553704 you are looking especially shiny
this morning. New polish?

553704 555706 Orion Pax,
I'm sorry that I somehow

555706 557499 gave you the impression
that we're friends.

558973 560711 Light up that wall!
Let's go! Ten seconds!

560711 562339 Happy to take
the lead today, Captain.

562339 563978 Feeling like I have
enough power in me

563978 565881 to drill down
and touch Primus myself.

565881 567542 You don't have
the touch or the power.

567542 569753 Ready positions,
rust buckets! Let's go!

569753 571689 She's in a good mood today.
Mm-hmm.

575055 576760 Here we go.
This one won't be open long.

608187 610453 It's unstable!
We got to go, we got to move!
624775 627778 I repeat, the tunnel is closing!

627778 630946 You with me, D?
On your six! Keep going!

638283 639449 Elita, we've got
a trapped miner.

645224 647589 It's closing!
Just grab your pack and go.
648832 651164 What? No, I didn't mean it!

661603 664309 Nothing much. Just normal
protocol-following stuff.

669248 671822 Orion Pax, could you please exit
the tunnel of death?
671822 673923 Elita, it's about to get messy out there!

685869 687695 Hurry!
We're not gonna make it!

696574 698673 What the hell, Pax?
I told you to evacuate.

698673 701247 I did, eventually.
If I get fired because of you--

701247 703216 Oh, please.
They're not
gonna fire you.

705647 708716 What? Why? I followed
protocol to the letter.

708716 710652 That is true.
I was the one
who broke the rules.

712324 714623 Darkwing, please,
I've worked too hard
for this.

714623 717692 You are no-cog bots
with limited options.

722037 724039 Elita...
Next time,
why don't you stop and think

730111 733345 I may not have a cog,
but my finger can transform.

733345 736282 Guess which one?
I'll give you
a "limited option."

741826 744257 I apologize
on his behalf for the--

764211 765883 You know you were
out of line,

765883 768116 talking back
to a superior like that.

768116 770283 Darkwing was out of line.
He deserves it.

772087 774584 Aren't you tired of being
treated like we're nothing?

775653 779028 He had every right
to hit me.
I interfered.

780999 783758 Hey, and I appreciate
you having my back.

785102 786871 I'm glad
you were there with me

786871 788466 to get punched in the face.
That was fun.
792602 795737 Stand by for a live transmission from Sentinel Prime.

795737 798641 He's back?
