3614553 3617457 All of them are like that.
So disrespectful.

3644189 3647322 You've been a little quiet.
Are you all right?

3647322 3651656 All I can think about
is Sentinel's smirking face.

3651656 3655495 He must pay for what he's done.
Someone has to do something.

3655495 3659708 We are. With Alpha's proof
inside that device,
we will show everyone the truth.

3659708 3662810 You honestly believe
it'll be that easy?

3662810 3664812 Iacon doesn't want
to hear the truth.

3667078 3669113 There's got to be
a better way
to bring him down.

3669113 3671819 We have to trust everyone will
believe what we show them.

3676793 3682093 I will never trust
a so-called leader ever again.

3684691 3686427 There's only one bot
I know I can trust--

3729778 3732605 We're not spies.
But he is incompetent.

3732605 3736950 Scanning electrical impulses.
He speaks the truth.

3736950 3741515 That just means
he believes himself,
like any spy would.

3755364 3760072 One, we slowly
dismantle each of you
one bolt and screw at a time,

3760072 3762734 and really make sure
you feel it.

3763878 3765671 In exchange
for a quick death,

3765671 3768113 you give us intel
on the Energon trains,

3770115 3773822 or anything else that could
hurt your boss, Sentinel Prime.

3781192 3783095 I told you
it wasn't tight enough!

3786230 3788969 He's right.
I read all about you
in the archives.

3788969 3792401 You were
the most legendary warriors
in all of Cybertron.

3797109 3799738 Raise your hand
if "wave" is in your name.
There's a lot of "waves."

3801311 3803445 The yellow annoying one
is correct.
3804446 3806283 We were once the High Guard.

3806283 3810023 We witnessed
Sentinel's betrayal,
saw the Primes fall.

3810023 3812927 Since that day, we've been
fighting from the shadows,

3812927 3815655 doing whatever we can
to sabotage Sentinel.

3815655 3817393 That's great! We're--
Whoa, whoa, whoa.

3817393 3821100 Okay, okay.
We're good.
Everyone relax.

3823597 3825665 We were on our way
back to Iacon,

3825665 3829735 and now with your help,
we can unify Cybertron
against Sentinel Prime.

3829735 3833882 The idea of a unified
Cybertron is a myth.

3833882 3838744 All that counts is the strength
of one bot over another!

3840713 3843617 Okay. So, these guys
are a little intense.

3851660 3853726 I tell you
what I'm not doing.

3853726 3857664 I'm not cowering
in some busted ship,
playing king of the throne.

3857664 3859864 I'm not pretending
like I'm making a difference

3859864 3862603 by throwing one punch
and then running away to hide!

3862603 3864869 I found out
that Sentinel is rotten today,

3864869 3866871 and I'm gonna
make him pay for it.

3868378 3871986 You think you can insult me
and just walk away?

3871986 3876023 No one leaves here
unless I say so.
3878687 3880852 Well, how can you say so
3880852 3882821 with my head in your teeth?
3898903 3902181 Do it! Come on! Yeah, more!

3907914 3912884 You want to see the strength
of one bot over another? Huh?

3912884 3914963 Is that
all you've got, tough bot?
3914963 3917757 Let's go! Do it! Come on!

3937480 3940318 Stop!
D, he's not the enemy!

3944784 3947589 This is the last time
I show mercy!

3950262 3954893 You can stay here in hiding,
bowing before
your pathetic leader,

3954893 3958237 or follow me
as we march on Iacon

3958237 3961801 and I take down Sentinel
once and for all!

4021995 4024765 Engage all hostiles!
I've got the bridge!

4080053 4082691 I feel like someone
dropped a cliff on me.

4085232 4089027 Sentinel's troops
took as many prisoners
as they could carry.

4092701 4095275 And half of those
High-Guard nutjobs.
4101316 4103580 So, what do we do now?

4107782 4111423 Look at it. Look around.
This is a disaster.

4113161 4115086 I should have
stayed on protocol.

4121369 4124766 Listen to me.
I really want you to hear this.

4133348 4135106 I'm better than you
in every way,

4137614 4141321 You always have. You went back
into the mine to rescue Jazz.

4141321 4145292 You snuck up
to the surface to find
the Matrix of Leadership.

4145292 4147118 Yeah,
and how'd that work out?

4148889 4153157 that your instincts tell you
to break protocol for a reason.

4153157 4156270 This blind optimism
that you have

4156270 4160637 is why you make such bold
and courageous choices,

4163508 4166071 First time
giving a pep talk?

4167842 4171219 You can envision a better future
that no one else can see.

4172288 4175322 And if we ever want to see
B and D-16 again,

4175322 4179359 that is the Orion Pax
that we need right now.

4185730 4189369 Those Energon trains
will be heading
back to Iacon.

4192097 4195309 Hell yes, I can reroute it.
What else do we need?

4195309 4200039 Well, my bold instincts tell me
we have to recruit some nutjobs.

4202076 4204384 I was afraid
you'd say that.

4204384 4207981 Uh, Shockwave, Soundwave.
You in the back.

4207981 4211259 In order to save
our captured friends,
we have to act now.

4211259 4213558 How about I blast you
back to Iacon?
4213558 4216990 Oh! She punched me in my eye!

4216990 4220235 Everyone, shut up!
All of you. Listen to him.

4221700 4224063 Most likely, our friends
are being held captive

4224063 4225735 at the top
of Sentinel's tower.

4225735 4228771 A surprise attack would
give us a chance to rescue them.

4228771 4233743 Impossible. We do not
have enough soldiers
or a way inside.

4233743 4236911 Elita will get us in.
And I will get more troops.

4241388 4244622 Attention, High Guard.
Prepare for battle.

4264204 4267843 I don't understand.
Why are we still alive?

4267843 4271451 Look at this rowdy bunch!
The High Guard!

4271451 4273321 You know, you guys
have been tough to find.

4273321 4276918 Every trip to the surface,
I've been searching for you.

4276918 4279459 Tracking the bots in the cave
led me right to them.

4280790 4283727 You captured Starscream!
It was too easy.

4283727 4285927 I'm going to rip you apart
piece by piece

4285927 4287434 so that your death
is painful!

4287434 4288732 You'll regret
the day you were--

4290701 4293737 Oh, D-16,
what a tragic story you'll be.

4293737 4297642 Atop the leaderboard
in your sector
and secretly a traitor.

4297642 4299743 I'm not a traitor.
You're the traitor.

4299743 4302482 Nuh-uh. You, all of you,
are traitors.

4302482 4306178 You've been working
with the Quintessons
to sabotage my expeditions.

4306178 4308620 You're the reason
why I haven't found
the Matrix of Leadership yet.

4309918 4311524 Oh, trust me,
it'll be very true

4311524 4314461 when I'm executing you
in front of all of Iacon.

4314461 4318289 Because down here,
the truth is what I make it.

4330303 4333007 I'm not kneeling
in front of you.

4334976 4338210 You don't scare me.
You want to know why?

4340522 4343556 Because I don't have
anything left to lose.

4355328 4358406 Of course you were a fan.
Megatronus was
the coolest Prime!

4358406 4361299 The biggest!
The baddest! The toughest!

4362544 4364775 That's why,
after I killed him,
4365811 4368042 I took his cog for myself.

4368042 4370550 He was greater
than you'll ever be!
4370550 4372849 I don't know. I'm pretty great.

4372849 4375720 But I can understand why you'd
want to wear his face over mine.

4378021 4381253 Let's make sure
it doesn't come off.

4418765 4422261 You can't be serious.
We just worked
22 shifts without a break!

4422261 4423999 These miners need rest
and time to repair and--

4426298 4429741 So get back in the mines
before I make you
get back in the--

4435406 4437408 Who was that?
Did you see
who that was?

4446384 4448793 Yeah, I know I, uh,
look a little different.

4454095 4456933 Sentinel told us you died
from your race injuries.

4461938 4464105 Look, I know how this will sound
coming from me.

4464105 4467614 I was never
the most focused miner.

4467614 4470078 But as you can see,
everything is different now.

4477923 4482156 I went to the surface
and I learned the truth.

4485291 4489394 we were all born
with transformation cogs.

4490430 4493607 And then Sentinel,
he stole them from us.

4493607 4497006 He took away our ability
to make our own decisions.

4502981 4508820 But now, I'm offering you
your first real choice.

4508820 4512956 You can work a 23rd shift
and mine yourself to death

4514663 4517488 or fight back
against Sentinel with me.

4520161 4523538 How are we supposed to do that?
We can't fight.
We don't have cogs.

4525872 4529808 What defines a Transformer
is not the cog in its chest

4529808 4532778 but the spark
that resides in their core.

4532778 4536947 A spark that gives you the will
to make your world better.

4536947 4540819 And that spark,
Sentinel can never
take from us.

4540819 4543217 There's not enough of us.
We'd need an army.

4543217 4546990 And we have one.
Elita is bringing troops.
4546990 4549058 We are not alone in this.

4549058 4551863 If we want to be in control
of our own destiny,

4551863 4553524 we will have to
fight for it.

4553524 4556901 Now is the time
for us to stand up...

4565371 4569078 I promise you
this fight will be worth it.

4571751 4574655 Nothing can stop us
when we stand together.
4578186 4582696 Orion Pax! Orion Pax! Orion Pax!

4586524 4588801 Buckle up, Blinky.
We're going in.

4621427 4623396 You really were
a great miner.

4627908 4630337 We've got a breach!
Protect Sentinel!

4639579 4642151 They spotted us.
It's about to get bumpy.

4661634 4663777 There's too many.
We have to abort!

4677681 4679452 That's what
I'm talking about, Pax!

4691365 4696073 You can't win, miner.
I see everything!

4698977 4701716 Except the tower we're
about to crash into.
4727205 4729007 What has he done to you?

4729007 4731878 This is nothing compared to
what I'm gonna do to Sentinel.

4739745 4742086 I know how to stop him.
Airachnid is the answer.

4742086 4743857 I'm doing this my way.
D!

4758069 4761039 It appeared
when this guy tried to--

4761039 4763074 Knife hands?
I have knife hands!

4783963 4788297 Did you really think
that you could knock down
everything I've built?

4788297 4792136 It's over, Sentinel.
You can't escape the truth.
What truth?

4792136 4794842 That I plucked the cogs
from your newborn chests?

4794842 4797042 Forced you to mine
so that I could pay off
the Quintessons

4798406 4801409 None of that matters!
Because the truth...

4815458 4817095 He's too strong.
I have a plan.

4819295 4821561 We need her memory.
Where is she?

4860140 4863009 Orion! Orion, look!
I have knife hands!

4864604 4866804 I'm gonna cut these guys.
Watch. Come here!

4866804 4868674 You can jab them later.
We got to go.

4892335 4894568 Uh, excuse me.
You can't be in here.

4903511 4906349 These are not
the bad guys.
Why did you cut the door?

4906349 4908989 What? No, I didn't--
That was an-- I--

4908989 4910617 It was already like that.
Right?

4910617 4911959 Yes, that's right.
That's right, yes.

4911959 4914060 Yeah, it was already like--
Yes. Mm-hmm.
4920594 4923971 Stand by for a live transmission from Sentinel Prime.
4939085 4943221 That's why after I killed him, I took his cog for myself.
4945553 4949392 What truth? That I plucked the cogs from your newborn chests?
4949392 4951097 Forced you to mine so that I could pay off
4951097 4952956 the Quintessons and live like a king?
4954661 4956597 That I plucked the cogs from your newborn chests?
4956597 4958302 Forced you to mine so that I could pay off
4958302 4960469 the Quintessons and live like a king?
4960469 4962306 I'm working my miners as hard as I can.
4962306 4965276 I swear I will get you the rest!
4965276 4967443 I'm working my miners as hard as I can.
4967443 4970248 I swear I will get you the rest!
4970248 4972613 I'm working my miners as hard as I can, I swear--

5038151 5040318 Everyone in Iacon
knows the truth.

5041979 5045158 He took everything from us!
I have to do this!

5046819 5050526 Rebuilding Iacon
cannot begin
with an execution.

5050526 5053056 He deserves to die!
Can't you see that?

5053056 5056070 We're better than this.
Don't be like Sentinel.

5059733 5063803 you need to move
out of my way
before I move you myself.
5091503 5093866 Why did you do that? Why?
5213427 5216461 The Age of Primes has ended!

5218826 5223094 Follow me and you will
never again be deceived.

5228506 5231707 Rise up! Rise up!
Rise up!
5234072 5237207 your noble sacrifice for the greater good
5237207 5241255 has proven you worthy in the eyes of Primus.

5254257 5257667 I will lead us all
into the future!

5303418 5305913 He's gonna kill everyone.
We have to stop him.
Come on.

5309114 5312887 It's over when every last one
of his followers is dead!

5354357 5356568 We could've built
the future together.

5358603 5362200 After I tear down
everyone in my way!

5466944 5470143 We were given the power
to change our world
5470143 5472651 and you chose to destroy it.

5474114 5477986 You have betrayed Cybertron
and its citizens.

5495467 5498138 Take the High Guard
and leave.

5507853 5510183 It didn't have to end
this way.
5542050 5545218 is not as clear as I once believed.
5545218 5549156 Once it's crossed, there's no going back.

5555063 5557230 Oh, yeah.
Well, he's my hero.

5557230 5559067 The greatest Prime
to ever live.

5571684 5574214 You watch my back,
I promise to watch yours.

5597710 5602715 I could use some help
from a bot who is
better than me in every way.

5604684 5607082 I have a pretty sweet gig
working in waste management.

5607082 5610085 Well, Captain,
I do owe you a promotion.

5617389 5621360 And I'm sorry, B,
but I cannot let you
go back to sublevel 50.
5621360 5623197 I may be a Prime now,

5623197 5624935 but I'm gonna need you
by my side.

5624935 5628433 Are you serious?
This is the greatest
day of my life.

5628433 5630633 I get to work
for the government.
5666374 5670112 And now we stand here together as one...
5672512 5675645 proving we all have the power to transform,
5675645 5678890 to become who we were destined to be,
5678890 5683587 to right wrongs, to make our world better.
5686766 5689494 are the rights of all sentient beings.
5696536 5700142 This message is a warning to all Quintessons.

5740182 5742679 Hey, guys! Great news,
the Energon's back!

5742679 5744956 And I have a cog
and I can transform!

5744956 5746892 It's a long story.
I'll fill you in later.

5746892 5750456 Oh! And here's the best part.
My hands are straight-up knives.
6203975 6207715 But his death has given life to a new enemy.
6213184 6217362 We will not be blinded by his deception.

subtitles.author: VikramJS
lines:
119386 121089 Okay, let's see
what we got here.
151586 155556 To protect our universe, he sacrificed his life force,
177845 182482 To assist them, Primus created an entity of great power,

184819 187655 The Matrix, there it is. Okay.
Good. Come on. Keep going.
187789 190190 [deep voice] With the Matrix in the Primes' possession,
212113 216851 [deep voice] For generations, there was peace and prosperity,

224092 228295 [groans] Why does every legend
about the Matrix
end right there?

228428 230497 [sighs] One of these
has to say what happened.

241743 244244 Well, hello, guys.
I'm so glad you're here.

245713 247215 [chuckles]
I must've taken a wrong turn.

247347 250084 It's that defective mining bot,
Oreon Pix!

251619 253487 We told you
to never come back here!

253621 256456 Why are we all yelling?
I'm gonna smash you!

256591 258993 Hold on.
Whoa, whoa, hold on.
No need for violence.

259127 262697 How about this:
I run away, you chase me.
We play that game. Huh?

262830 264732 Come on.
You're bigger, faster.
It'll be fun.

264866 267602 He doesn't have a cog.
Let's give him a head start.

267735 270705 Why not?
It's not like
he can transform.

283350 284819 Something that flies.
Something that flies.

360628 362597 [chuckling] Okay, fellas!
Thanks for the head start.

362730 363931 You want to give me
another one?

364065 366466 You're dead!
I'll take that as a no.

368468 370204 Oh...
What did you say, no-cog?

370338 371639 Sorry, sir,
I didn't mean you.

371772 373541 I was referring
to the bot
who was behind you.

375276 376510 The filthy
red and blue bot?

376644 378512 Has a big mouth,
squeaky joints,

378646 380248 gives off a corroded
metallic stench?

380380 381816 Where is he?
He went that way.

381949 384451 When I get
my hands on that bot...

394896 397464 Okay, D-16,
I may be a little rusty,

399133 401102 Let me guess.
Chased out of
the archives?

401235 403371 [laughs] Yeah.
I had to jump
out of a window this time.

405139 407407 And digging through
ancient data
is worth dying for?
408809 410077 I need a new best friend.

410211 411979 If there are clues
in our recorded history

412113 414282 that can help locate
the Matrix of Leadership,

419053 420955 is up on the surface
right now,

421088 424158 risking his life for us
in search of the Matrix.

424292 427427 That's exactly what I'm doing.
I'm trying to help him.

430831 432833 the sooner we won't
have to mine for it.

432967 435102 Don't you want
to choose your own path,
do whatever you want?

435236 437838 We're miners.
We mine, that's all.

437972 442442 No, there has got to be
something more I can do.
I can feel it.

442576 444477 Oh, yeah? Like the time
you had a "feeling"

444612 446113 you could transform
without a cog?

446247 447949 You said you were never
gonna mention that again.

448082 450483 Took me three days
to pry you open.

450618 451786 Your feelings
get you in trouble.

453154 455723 Just trust
in Sentinel Prime.
I do trust in him.
457325 458960 Hey, if we did have cogs--

459093 461162 I'd transform
into a shovel
and beat you.

461295 463130 I don't like how fast
you answered that.

463264 466033 But listen, if you did beat me,
I couldn't give you this awesome

466167 468269 Megatronus Prime thing
I have here. It's cool.

468402 471439 I'll give it
to someone else.
What Megatronus Prime thing?

471572 473140 Ah, it's nothing.
Just a, you know,

473274 476577 mint-condition Megatronus Prime
decal, first edition.

478179 479947 If you don't want it,
I can just throw it away.

480081 481615 Throw it away? Don't--
That's not funny.
Let me see.

481749 484251 Wait. Don't grab.
You're gonna crease it.

486187 488656 You know, Sentinel says
Megatronus was the--

488789 490591 The strongest Prime
to ever live.

492126 496630 Looks good on you.
Ah, it's really cool.
506140 508676 [electronic voice] Approaching sublevel station. Stand clear of doors.

530664 533034 Metal to the pedal, drill bits.
This is it.

533167 535603 How much Energon have you mined
under my leadership?

537004 538873 And how perfect
is my mining record?

540608 542777 We are a mere
30 units of Energon away

550519 553154 you are looking especially shiny
this morning. New polish?

553287 555156 Orion Pax,
I'm sorry that I somehow

555289 557191 gave you the impression
that we're friends.

558692 560161 Light up that wall!
Let's go! Ten seconds!

560294 561862 Happy to take
the lead today, Captain.

561996 563564 Feeling like I have
enough power in me

563697 565499 to drill down
and touch Primus myself.

565633 567034 You don't have
the touch or the power.

567168 569203 Ready positions,
rust buckets! Let's go!

569336 571338 She's in a good mood today.
Mm-hmm.

574575 576410 [Elita] Here we go.
This one won't be open long.

607875 610277 It's unstable!
We got to go, we got to move!
624559 627228 I repeat, the tunnel is closing!

627361 630865 You with me, D?
[D-16] On your six! Keep going!

637972 638973 Elita, we've got
a trapped miner.

644912 647281 It's closing!
Just grab your pack and go.
648617 651051 What? No, I didn't mean it!

661228 663864 Nothing much. Just normal
protocol-following stuff.

668936 671272 Orion Pax, could you please exit
the tunnel of death?
671405 673542 [Orion] Elita, it's about to get messy out there!

685654 687388 Hurry!
We're not gonna make it!

696197 698165 What the hell, Pax?
I told you to evacuate.

698299 700834 I did, eventually.
If I get fired because of you--

700968 703103 Oh, please.
They're not
gonna fire you.

705272 708209 What? Why? I followed
protocol to the letter.

708342 710344 That is true.
I was the one
who broke the rules.

712012 714114 Darkwing, please,
I've worked too hard
for this.

714248 717184 You are no-cog bots
with limited options.

721590 723658 Elita...
Next time,
why don't you stop and think

729664 732900 I may not have a cog,
but my finger can transform.

733033 735869 Guess which one?
I'll give you
a "limited option."

741408 743844 I apologize
on his behalf for the--

763931 765332 You know you were
out of line,

765466 767736 talking back
to a superior like that.

767868 770070 Darkwing was out of line.
He deserves it.

771640 774408 Aren't you tired of being
treated like we're nothing?

775276 778979 He had every right
to hit me.
I interfered.

780548 783551 Hey, and I appreciate
you having my back.

784818 786353 I'm glad
you were there with me

786487 788022 to get punched in the face.
That was fun.
792259 795229 Stand by for a live transmission from Sentinel Prime.

795362 798165 He's back?
He's back already?
Maybe he found the Matrix.
810779 813847 who toil selflessly to maintain our Energon reserves.
822222 824892 Once again, I have narrowly returned with my fleet
826561 829731 across the desolate, dangerous surface of our planet.
829863 832366 I departed with hopes of finding the Matrix of Leadership,
839406 842577 This is a setback, but not a failure.
842711 845814 Rest assured, I will find the Matrix of Leadership,
849950 853253 Right now, I think we all deserve a little fun!
853387 855889 Tomorrow, there will be no work. All shifts off
867301 871773 Let's all see which competitor can prove they are truly more than meets the eye.

892694 895028 Oh, good, you're up.
Come on, I have an idea.

895162 897965 [D-16] Whatever this is,
it better be good.

898098 899734 Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
Okay. Listen.

899868 901803 All right, what if...
what if...

904338 908375 we ran
in the Iacon 5000, huh?

909209 911044 What if kill you
for waking me up?
911178 912847 No, no, no, hear me out.
912980 914214 We don't even have to win!

914348 915517 Oh, that's good,
because we wouldn't.

915650 918887 But-- But if we beat
just one Transformer,

919052 920889 it proves
we're just as good as they are.

921021 922990 Not only would we
go down in history,

923123 926260 the mining bots
that did the impossible,

926393 928162 but we would show everyone
that we're--

928295 930197 we're capable
of so much more!

931599 933267 and then busted
back to tier one.

933400 936203 Yeah, but at least we would've
done something, you know?

939440 942209 We're mining bots
who can't transform.

942342 945580 We can't fly,
we can't roll,

963363 964666 [Orion] I have a surprise
for you. Come on.

964799 967034 Where are you going?
The stadium's that way.

967167 968770 Yeah, yeah, I know.
Follow me.

968903 970839 Great.
We're gonna be late now.

972907 975844 We came all this way to miss
the opening ceremony.
This is wonderful!

975976 977978 Trust me,
I know what I'm doing.

982884 986320 Get caught in one of those,
it'll launch you
halfway across the city.

986453 987988 Okay,

back to Iacon,

3825159 3829229 and now with your help,
we can unify Cybertron
against Sentinel Prime.

3829363 3833367 The idea of a unified
Cybertron is a myth.

3833500 3838439 All that counts is the strength
of one bot over another!

3840374 3843344 Okay. So, these guys
are a little intense.

3851285 3853253 I tell you
what I'm not doing.

3853387 3857191 I'm not cowering
in some busted ship,
playing king of the throne.

3857324 3859360 I'm not pretending
like I'm making a difference

3859493 3862129 by throwing one punch
and then running away to hide!

3862262 3864365 I found out
that Sentinel is rotten today,

3864498 3866568 and I'm gonna
make him pay for it.

3868102 3871639 You think you can insult me
and just walk away?

3871773 3875677 No one leaves here
unless I say so.
3878312 3880548 Well, how can you say so
3880682 3882517 with my head in your teeth?

3898533 3901803 Do it! Come on! Yeah, more!
[crowd cheers]

3907509 3912379 You want to see the strength
of one bot over another? Huh?

3912514 3914649 [voice crackling] Is that
all you've got, tough bot?
3914783 3917484 Let's go! Do it! Come on!

3937204 3940240 Stop!
D, he's not the enemy!

3944445 3947147 This is the last time
I show mercy!

3949818 3954388 You can stay here in hiding,
bowing before
your pathetic leader,

3954522 3957859 or follow me
as we march on Iacon

3958025 3961529 and I take down Sentinel
once and for all!

4021589 4024626 [Airachnid] Engage all hostiles!
I've got the bridge!

4079647 4082249 I feel like someone
dropped a cliff on me.

4084819 4088723 Sentinel's troops
took as many prisoners
as they could carry.

4092426 4095228 And half of those
High-Guard nutjobs.
4101069 4103170 So, what do we do now?

4107474 4111345 Look at it. Look around.
This is a disaster.

4112780 4114882 I should have
stayed on protocol.

4120922 4124324 Listen to me.
I really want you to hear this.

4133101 4134802 I'm better than you
in every way,

4137137 4140775 You always have. You went back
into the mine to rescue Jazz.

4140908 4144746 You snuck up
to the surface to find
the Matrix of Leadership.

4144879 4146814 [chuckles] Yeah,
and how'd that work out?

4148549 4152654 that your instincts tell you
to break protocol for a reason.

4152787 4155723 This blind optimism
that you have

4155857 4160528 is why you make such bold
and courageous choices,

4163263 4165767 First time
giving a pep talk?

4167535 4171005 You can envision a better future
that no one else can see.

4171839 4174776 And if we ever want to see
B and D-16 again,

4174909 4179312 that is the Orion Pax
that we need right now.

4185419 4189023 Those Energon trains
will be heading
back to Iacon.

4191726 4194762 Hell yes, I can reroute it.
What else do we need?

4194896 4199867 Well, my bold instincts tell me
we have to recruit some nutjobs.

4201703 4203838 I was afraid
you'd say that.

4203971 4207508 Uh, Shockwave, Soundwave.
You in the back.

4207642 4210745 In order to save
our captured friends,
we have to act now.

4210878 4213181 How about I blast you
back to Iacon?

4213313 4216517 [pained grunt]
Oh! She punched me in my eye!

4216651 4220220 Everyone, shut up!
All of you. Listen to him.

4221388 4223591 Most likely, our friends
are being held captive

4223725 4225126 at the top
of Sentinel's tower.

4225292 4228162 A surprise attack would
give us a chance to rescue them.

4228295 4233333 Impossible. We do not
have enough soldiers
or a way inside.

4233467 4236470 Elita will get us in.
And I will get more troops.

4240975 4244244 Attention, High Guard.
Prepare for battle.

4263798 4267400 I don't understand.
Why are we still alive?

4267535 4270905 Look at this rowdy bunch!
The High Guard!

4271038 4272807 You know, you guys
have been tough to find.

4272940 4276476 Every trip to the surface,
I've been searching for you.

4276611 4279113 Tracking the bots in the cave
led me right to them.

4280515 4283117 You captured Starscream!
It was too easy.

4283251 4285485 [high-pitch]
I'm going to rip you apart
piece by piece

4285620 4287088 so that your death
is painful!
[laughs]

4287221 4288321 You'll regret
the day you were--

4290423 4293161 Oh, D-16,
what a tragic story you'll be.

4293293 4297265 Atop the leaderboard
in your sector
and secretly a traitor.

4297397 4299332 I'm not a traitor.
You're the traitor.

4299466 4301936 Nuh-uh. You, all of you,
are traitors.

4302069 4305506 You've been working
with the Quintessons
to sabotage my expeditions.

4305640 4308242 You're the reason
why I haven't found
the Matrix of Leadership yet.

4309610 4310978 Oh, trust me,
it'll be very true

4311112 4313915 when I'm executing you
in front of all of Iacon.

4314048 4317985 Because down here,
the truth is what I make it.

4329897 4332567 I'm not kneeling
in front of you.

4334669 4337939 You don't scare me.
You want to know why?

4340074 4343211 Because I don't have
anything left to lose.

4354922 4357892 Of course you were a fan.
Megatronus was
the coolest Prime!

4358025 4361095 The biggest!
The baddest! The toughest!

4362296 4364699 That's why,
after I killed him,
4365498 4367602 I took his cog for myself.

4367735 4370204 He was greater
than you'll ever be!
4370338 4372240 I don't know. I'm pretty great.

4372372 4375343 But I can understand why you'd
want to wear his face over mine.

4377678 4380982 Let's make sure
it doesn't come off.

4418286 4421789 [miner] You can't be serious.
We just worked
22 shifts without a break!

4421923 4423557 These miners need rest
and time to repair and--

4425960 4429363 So get back in the mines
before I make you
get back in the--

4435036 4437104 Who was that?
Did you see
who that was?

4446013 4448416 Yeah, I know I, uh,
look a little different.

4453788 4456824 Sentinel told us you died
from your race injuries.

4461662 4463664 Look, I know how this will sound
coming from me.

4463798 4467068 I was never
the most focused miner.

4467201 4469637 But as you can see,
everything is different now.

4477611 4482016 I went to the surface
and I learned the truth.

4484952 4489223 we were all born
with transformation cogs.

4490024 4493094 And then Sentinel,
he stole them from us.

4493227 4496597 He took away our ability
to make our own decisions.

4502470 4508242 But now, I'm offering you
your first real choice.

4508376 4512847 You can work a 23rd shift
and mine yourself to death

4514215 4517284 or fight back
against Sentinel with me.

4519653 4523524 How are we supposed to do that?
We can't fight.
We don't have cogs.

4525393 4529430 What defines a Transformer
is not the cog in its chest

4529563 4532199 but the spark
that resides in their core.

4532333 4536337 A spark that gives you the will
to make your world better.

4536470 4540241 And that spark,
Sentinel can never
take from us.

4540374 4542777 There's not enough of us.
We'd need an army.

4542910 4546580 And we have one.
Elita is bringing troops.
4546714 4548649 We are not alone in this.

4548783 4551485 If we want to be in control
of our own destiny,

4551619 4553020 we will have to
fight for it.

4553154 4556525 Now is the time
for us to stand up...

4565032 4568969 I promise you
this fight will be worth it.

4571338 4574108 Nothing can stop us
when we stand together.

4577878 4582349 [all chanting]
Orion Pax! Orion Pax! Orion Pax!

4586153 4588756 Buckle up, Blinky.
We're going in.

4621088 4623224 You really were
a great miner.

4627461 4630197 We've got a breach!
Protect Sentinel!

4639173 4642042 They spotted us.
It's about to get bumpy.

4661228 4663731 [alarm blaring]
There's too many.
We have to abort!

4677311 4679280 [Elita] That's what
I'm talking about, Pax!

4691058 4695996 You can't win, miner.
I see everything!

4698533 4701702 Except the tower we're
about to crash into.
4726927 4728429 What has he done to you?

4728563 4731633 This is nothing compared to
what I'm gonna do to Sentinel.

4739340 4741710 I know how to stop him.
Airachnid is the answer.

4741842 4743811 I'm doing this my way.
D!

4757825 4760662 It appeared
when this guy tried to--

4760794 4762997 Knife hands?
I have knife hands!

4783551 4787689 Did you really think
that you could knock down
everything I've built?

4787821 4791559 It's over, Sentinel.
You can't escape the truth.
[Sentinel] What truth?

4791693 4794361 That I plucked the cogs
from your newborn chests?

4794495 4796665 Forced you to mine
so that I could pay off
the Quintessons

4798098 4800968 None of that matters!
Because the truth...

4815115 4816718 He's too strong.
I have a plan.

4819019 4821288 We need her memory.
Where is she?

4859893 4862664 Orion! Orion, look!
I have knife hands!

4864264 4866300 I'm gonna cut these guys.
Watch. Come here!

4866433 4868502 You can jab them later.
We got to go.

4892059 4894428 Uh, excuse me.
You can't be in here.

4903203 4905939 These are not
the bad guys.
Why did you cut the door?

4906073 4908643 What? No, I didn't--
That was an-- I--

4908777 4910177 It was already like that.
Right?

4910310 4911445 Yes, that's right.
That's right, yes.

4911579 4914014 Yeah, it was already like--
Yes. Mm-hmm.
4920087 4923957 Stand by for a live transmission from Sentinel Prime.
4936704 4938540 [Sentinel on recording] That's why after I killed him--
4938673 4942844 That's why after I killed him, I took his cog for myself.
4945045 4948982 What truth? That I plucked the cogs from your newborn chests?
4949116 4950552 Forced you to mine so that I could pay off
4954354 4956156 That I plucked the cogs from your newborn chests?
4956290 4957926 Forced you to mine so that I could pay off
4960227 4961930 I'm working my miners as hard as I can.
4962062 4964699 I swear I will get you the rest!
4964833 4966835 I'm working my miners as hard as I can.
4966967 4969671 I swear I will get you the rest! [crowd gasps]
4969804 4972372 I'm working my miners as hard as I can, I swear--

5037939 5039941 Everyone in Iacon
knows the truth.

5041609 5044812 He took everything from us!
I have to do this!

5046480 5050117 Rebuilding Iacon
cannot begin
with an execution.

5050250 5052554 He deserves to die!
Can't you see that?

5052687 5056056 We're better than this.
Don't be like Sentinel.

5059426 5063330 you need to move
out of my way
before I move you myself.
5091224 5093595 Why did you do that? Why?
5213181 5216084 The Age of Primes has ended!

5218519 5222924 Follow me and you will
never again be deceived.

5228261 5231298 Rise up! Rise up!
Rise up!
5236838 5241241 has proven you worthy in the eyes of Primus.

5253888 5257592 I will lead us all
into the future!

5302970 5305773 He's gonna kill everyone.
We have to stop him.
Come on.

5308776 5312780 It's over when every last one
of his followers is dead!

5353988 5356224 We could've built
the future together.

5358358 5362029 After I tear down
everyone in my way!

5466634 5469704 We were given the power
to change our world
5469837 5472306 and you chose to destroy it.

5473808 5477878 You have betrayed Cybertron
and its citizens.

5495096 5497999 Take the High Guard
and leave.

5507575 5510044 It didn't have to end
this way.
5541776 5544779 is not as clear as I once believed.

5554789 5556791 Oh, yeah.
Well, he's my hero.

5556924 5558659 [both] The greatest Prime
to ever live.

5571272 5573974 You watch my back,
I promise to watch yours.

5597298 5602369 I could use some help
from a bot who is
better than me in every way.

5604271 5606674 I have a pretty sweet gig
working in waste management.

5606807 5609677 Well, Captain,
I do owe you a promotion.

5616851 5620888 And I'm sorry, B,
but I cannot let you
go back to sublevel 50.
5621021 5622756 I may be a Prime now,

5622890 5624358 but I'm gonna need you
by my side.

5624492 5627962 Are you serious?
This is the greatest
day of my life.

5628095 5630131 I get to work
for the government.
5665833 5670004 [Optimus Prime] And now we stand here together as one...
5672139 5675142 proving we all have the power to transform,
5675276 5678345 to become who we were destined to be,
5678479 5683083 to right wrongs, to make our world better.
5696197 5699534 This message is a warning to all Quintessons.
5699668 5705272 If you dare return to Cybertron, the Autobots will be waiting.

5739907 5742176 Hey, guys! Great news,
the Energon's back!

5742309 5744411 And I have a cog
and I can transform!

5744546 5746347 It's a long story.
I'll fill you in later.

5746480 5750017 Oh! And here's the best part.
My hands are straight-up knives.
6203638 6207307 But his death has given life to a new enemy.
6212780 6217018 We will not be blinded by his deception.

subtitles.author: VikramJS
lines:
119386 121089 Okay, let's see
what we got here.
151586 155556 To protect our universe, he sacrificed his life force,
177845 182482 To assist them, Primus created an entity of great power,

184819 187655 The Matrix, there it is. Okay.
Good. Come on. Keep going.

224092 228295 Why does every legend
about the Matrix
end right there?

228428 230497 One of these
has to say what happened.

241743 244244 Well, hello, guys.
I'm so glad you're here.
245713 247215 I must've taken a wrong turn.

247347 250084 It's that defective mining bot,
Oreon Pix!

251619 253487 We told you
to never come back here!

253621 256456 Why are we all yelling?
I'm gonna smash you!

256591 258993 Hold on.
Whoa, whoa, hold on.
No need for violence.

259127 262697 How about this:
I run away, you chase me.
We play that game. Huh?

262830 264732 Come on.
You're bigger, faster.
It'll be fun.

264866 267602 He doesn't have a cog.
Let's give him a head start.

267735 270705 Why not?
It's not like
he can transform.

283350 284819 Something that flies.
Something that flies.

360628 362597 Okay, fellas!
Thanks for the head start.

362730 363931 You want to give me
another one?

364065 366466 You're dead!
I'll take that as a no.

368468 370204 Oh...
What did you say, no-cog?

370338 371639 Sorry, sir,
I didn't mean you.

371772 373541 I was referring
to the bot
who was behind you.

375276 376510 The filthy
red and blue bot?

376644 378512 Has a big mouth,
squeaky joints,

378646 380248 gives off a corroded
metallic stench?

380380 381816 Where is he?
He went that way.

381949 384451 When I get
my hands on that bot...

394896 397464 Okay, D-16,
I may be a little rusty,

399133 401102 Let me guess.
Chased out of
the archives?

401235 403371 Yeah.
I had to jump
out of a window this time.

405139 407407 And digging through
ancient data
is worth dying for?
408809 410077 I need a new best friend.

410211 411979 If there are clues
in our recorded history

412113 414282 that can help locate
the Matrix of Leadership,

419053 420955 is up on the surface
right now,

421088 424158 risking his life for us
in search of the Matrix.

424292 427427 That's exactly what I'm doing.
I'm trying to help him.

430831 432833 the sooner we won't
have to mine for it.

432967 435102 Don't you want
to choose your own path,
do whatever you want?

435236 437838 We're miners.
We mine, that's all.

437972 442442 No, there has got to be
something more I can do.
I can feel it.

442576 444477 Oh, yeah? Like the time
you had a "feeling"

444612 446113 you could transform
without a cog?

446247 447949 You said you were never
gonna mention that again.

448082 450483 Took me three days
to pry you open.

450618 451786 Your feelings
get you in trouble.

453154 455723 Just trust
in Sentinel Prime.
I do trust in him.
457325 458960 Hey, if we did have cogs--

459093 461162 I'd transform
into a shovel
and beat you.

461295 463130 I don't like how fast
you answered that.

463264 466033 But listen, if you did beat me,
I couldn't give you this awesome

466167 468269 Megatronus Prime thing
I have here. It's cool.

468402 471439 I'll give it
to someone else.
What Megatronus Prime thing?

471572 473140 Ah, it's nothing.
Just a, you know,

473274 476577 mint-condition Megatronus Prime
decal, first edition.

478179 479947 If you don't want it,
I can just throw it away.

480081 481615 Throw it away? Don't--
That's not funny.
Let me see.

481749 484251 Wait. Don't grab.
You're gonna crease it.

486187 488656 You know, Sentinel says
Megatronus was the--

488789 490591 The strongest Prime
to ever live.

492126 496630 Looks good on you.
Ah, it's really cool.

530664 533034 Metal to the pedal, drill bits.
This is it.

533167 535603 How much Energon have you mined
under my leadership?

537004 538873 And how perfect
is my mining record?

540608 542777 We are a mere
30 units of Energon away

550519 553154 you are looking especially shiny
this morning. New polish?

553287 555156 Orion Pax,
I'm sorry that I somehow

555289 557191 gave you the impression
that we're friends.

558692 560161 Light up that wall!
Let's go! Ten seconds!

560294 561862 Happy to take
the lead today, Captain.

561996 563564 Feeling like I have
enough power in me

563697 565499 to drill down
and touch Primus myself.

565633 567034 You don't have
the touch or the power.

567168 569203 Ready positions,
rust buckets! Let's go!

569336 571338 She's in a good mood today.
Mm-hmm.

574575 576410 Here we go.
This one won't be open long.

607875 610277 It's unstable!
We got to go, we got to move!
624559 627228 I repeat, the tunnel is closing!

627361 630865 - You with me, D?
- On your six! Keep going!

637972 638973 Elita, we've got
a trapped miner.

644912 647281 It's closing!
Just grab your pack and go.
648617 651051 What? No, I didn't mean it!

661228 663864 Nothing much. Just normal
protocol-following stuff.

668936 671272 Orion Pax, could you please exit
the tunnel of death?
671405 673542 Elita, it's about to get messy out there!

685654 687388 Hurry!
We're not gonna make it!

696197 698165 What the hell, Pax?
I told you to evacuate.

698299 700834 I did, eventually.
If I get fired because of you--

700968 703103 Oh, please.
They're not
gonna fire you.

705272 708209 What? Why? I followed
protocol to the letter.

708342 710344 That is true.
I was the one
who broke the rules.

712012 714114 Darkwing, please,
I've worked too hard
for this.

714248 717184 You are no-cog bots
with limited options.

721590 723658 Elita...
Next time,
why don't you stop and think

729664 732900 I may not have a cog,
but my finger can transform.

733033 735869 Guess which one?
I'll give you
a "limited option."

741408 743844 I apologize
on his behalf for the--

763931 765332 You know you were
out of line,

765466 767736 talking back
to a superior like that.

767868 770070 Darkwing was out of line.
He deserves it.

771640 774408 Aren't you tired of being
treated like we're nothing?

775276 778979 He had every right
to hit me.
I interfered.

780548 783551 Hey, and I appreciate
you having my back.

784818 786353 I'm glad
you were there with me

786487 788022 to get punched in the face.
That was fun.
792259 795229 Stand by for a live transmission from Sentinel Prime.

795362 798165 He's back?
He's back already?
Maybe he found the Matrix.
810779 813847 who toil selflessly to maintain our Energon reserves.
822222 824892 Once again, I have narrowly returned with my fleet
826561 829731 across the desolate, dangerous surface of our planet.
829863 832366 I departed with hopes of finding the Matrix of Leadership,
839406 842577 This is a setback, but not a failure.
842711 845814 Rest assured, I will find the Matrix of Leadership,
849950 853253 Right now, I think we all deserve a little fun!
853387 855889 Tomorrow, there will be no work. All shifts off
867301 871773 Let's all see which competitor can prove they are truly more than meets the eye.

892694 895028 Oh, good, you're up.
Come on, I have an idea.

895162 897965 Whatever this is,
it better be good.

898098 899734 Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
Okay. Listen.

899868 901803 All right, what if...
what if...

904338 908375 we ran
in the Iacon 5000, huh?

909209 911044 What if kill you
for waking me up?
911178 912847 No, no, no, hear me out.
912980 914214 We don't even have to win!

914348 915517 Oh, that's good,
because we wouldn't.

915650 918887 But-- But if we beat
just one Transformer,

919052 920889 it proves
we're just as good as they are.

921021 922990 Not only would we
go down in history,

923123 926260 the mining bots
that did the impossible,

926393 928162 but we would show everyone
that we're--

928295 930197 we're capable
of so much more!

931599 933267 and then busted
back to tier one.

933400 936203 Yeah, but at least we would've
done something, you know?

939440 942209 We're mining bots
who can't transform.

942342 945580 We can't fly,
we can't roll,

963363 964666 I have a surprise
for you. Come on.

964799 967034 Where are you going?
The stadium's that way.

967167 968770 Yeah, yeah, I know.
Follow me.

968903 970839 Great.
We're gonna be late now.

972907 975844 We came all this way to miss
the opening ceremony.
This is wonderful!

975976 977978 Trust me,
I know what I'm doing.

982884 986320 Get caught in one of those,
it'll launch you
halfway across the city.

986453 987988 Okay,
where are you taking me?

989791 992292 Don't be a glitch, this will be
totally worth it. Trust me.
992426 993561 Hey, you don't be a glitch.

993695 995329 Look, I know this is, like,
fun for you,

996931 999466 but if you make me miss
any part of the Iacon 5000,

999601 1003437 I swear I will smelt
your face right off your...
1009878 1015182 Put your hands together as today's competitors are taking the field.

1018285 1022222 This is unbelievable!
I feel like I'm in the race!
1034101 1037237 And now the moment you've all been waiting for.

1054622 1058793 Yes! It feels so good
to be here with you all today.

1068670 1071171 since the Quintessons
attacked our home.

1071305 1074809 Fifty cycles since we lost
the Matrix of Leadership

1074943 1077311 and our Energon supply
dried up.

1077444 1081348 Fifty cycles since the battle
that killed the other Primes,

1081481 1083350 my brothers
and sisters in arms.

1083483 1087354 Today we honor the Primes
who gave their lives for ours

1087487 1091593 and we show them
that the strength of Cybertron
will never be diminished.

1102904 1105673 I can't believe we get to watch
from the starting line.

1105807 1108308 The best seats
in the house!

1111111 1114015 It's time to show them
we are more than meets the eye.

1125093 1127729 Are you crazy?
Sure feels like it.

1134802 1137337 I'm sorry, are those
miners in the race?

1137471 1139473 Miners!
Those are miners,
like us!
1139607 1142610 I can't believe what I'm seeing here! Miners trying to run
1142744 1144378 in the Iacon 5000! You've got to be kidding me.

1146581 1149149 There are miners
in the race!
Miners?

1149282 1150350 No way!
They can't even transform!

1163263 1165733 If we survive this,
I'm gonna kill you!
1172339 1175409 It's Tailwind pulling into the lead down the main stretch

1183785 1186621 I owe you one.
More like a thousand.

1188790 1190658 I can't believe
we're not in last place!

1213114 1215750 - Hey! Get off!
- Spinout! Big fan!

1215883 1218485 Hey!
Jetstorm, I'm so sorry.
Big fan!
1244812 1247582 We can now focus on the real contenders in this race.
1265199 1269336 I don't believe it! The miners take down Darkwing!
